content_en_si: And those who harm believing men and believing women for [something] other than what they have earned have certainly born upon themselves a slander and manifest sin.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ قُل لِّأَزْوَاجِكَ وَبَنَاتِكَ وَنِسَاءِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ يُدْنِينَ عَلَيْهِنَّ مِن جَلَابِيبِهِنَّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدْنَىٰ أَن يُعْرَفْنَ فَلَا يُؤْذَيْنَ ۗ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
content_en_si: O Prophet, tell your wives and your daughters and the women of the believers to bring down over themselves [part] of their outer garments. That is more suitable that they will be known and not be abused. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

content_ar: ۞ لَّئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ الْمُنَافِقُونَ وَالَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَالْمُرْجِفُونَ فِي الْمَدِينَةِ لَنُغْرِيَنَّكَ بِهِمْ ثُمَّ لَا يُجَاوِرُونَكَ فِيهَا إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
content_en_si: If the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease and those who spread rumors in al-Madinah do not cease, We will surely incite you against them; then they will not remain your neighbors therein except for a little.

content_ar: مَّلْعُونِينَ ۖ أَيْنَمَا ثُقِفُوا أُخِذُوا وَقُتِّلُوا تَقْتِيلًا
content_en_si: Accursed wherever they are found, [being] seized and massacred completely.

content_ar: سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ فِي الَّذِينَ خَلَوْا مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا
content_en_si: [This is] the established way of Allah with those who passed on before; and you will not find in the way of Allah any change.

content_ar: يَسْأَلُكَ النَّاسُ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ اللَّهِ ۚ وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّ السَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا
content_en_si: People ask you concerning the Hour. Say," Knowledge of it is only with Allah. And what may make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near."

content_ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَعَنَ الْكَافِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ سَعِيرًا
content_en_si: Indeed, Allah has cursed the disbelievers and prepared for them a Blaze.

content_ar: خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
content_en_si: Abiding therein forever, they will not find a protector or a helper.

content_ar: يَوْمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمْ فِي النَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَا لَيْتَنَا أَطَعْنَا اللَّهَ وَأَطَعْنَا الرَّسُولَا
content_en_si: The Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire, they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger."

content_ar: وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا إِنَّا أَطَعْنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَرَاءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا السَّبِيلَا
content_en_si: And they will say, "Our Lord, indeed we obeyed our masters and our dignitaries, and they led us astray from the [right] way.

content_ar: رَبَّنَا آتِهِمْ ضِعْفَيْنِ مِنَ الْعَذَابِ وَالْعَنْهُمْ لَعْنًا كَبِيرًا
content_en_si: Our Lord, give them double the punishment and curse them with a great curse."

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَكُونُوا كَالَّذِينَ آذَوْا مُوسَىٰ فَبَرَّأَهُ اللَّهُ مِمَّا قَالُوا ۚ وَكَانَ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَجِيهًا
content_en_si: O you who have believed, be not like those who abused Moses; then Allah cleared him of what they said. And he, in the sight of Allah, was distinguished.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَقُولُوا قَوْلًا سَدِيدًا
content_en_si: O you who have believed, fear Allah and speak words of appropriate justice.

content_ar: يُصْلِحْ لَكُمْ أَعْمَالَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ذُنُوبَكُمْ ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَقَدْ فَازَ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًا
content_en_si: He will [then] amend for you your deeds and forgive you your sins. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly attained a great attainment.

content_ar: إِنَّا عَرَضْنَا الْأَمَانَةَ عَلَى السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَالْجِبَالِ فَأَبَيْنَ أَن يَحْمِلْنَهَا وَأَشْفَقْنَ مِنْهَا وَحَمَلَهَا الْإِنسَانُ ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ ظَلُومًا جَهُولًا
content_en_si: Indeed, we offered the Trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains, and they declined to bear it and feared it; but man [undertook to] bear it. Indeed, he was unjust and ignorant.

content_ar: لِّيُعَذِّبَ اللَّهُ الْمُنَافِقِينَ وَالْمُنَافِقَاتِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ وَالْمُشْرِكَاتِ وَيَتُوبَ اللَّهُ عَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ۗ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
content_en_si: [It was] so that Allah may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women and the men and women who associate others with Him and that Allah may accept repentance from the believing men and believing women. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ ۚ وَهُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْخَبِيرُ
content_en_si: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and to Him belongs [all] praise in the Hereafter. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted.

content_ar: يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۚ وَهُوَ الرَّحِيمُ الْغَفُورُ
content_en_si: He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein. And He is the Merciful, the Forgiving.

content_ar: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَا تَأْتِينَا السَّاعَةُ ۖ قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّي لَتَأْتِيَنَّكُمْ عَالِمِ الْغَيْبِ ۖ لَا يَعْزُبُ عَنْهُ مِثْقَالُ ذَرَّةٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا أَصْغَرُ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَا أَكْبَرُ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ
content_en_si: But those who disbelieve say, "The Hour will not come to us." Say, "Yes, by my Lord, it will surely come to you. [Allah is] the Knower of the unseen." Not absent from Him is an atom's weight within the heavens or within the earth or [what is] smaller than that or greater, except that it is in a clear register -

content_ar: لِّيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَرِزْقٌ كَرِيمٌ
content_en_si: That He may reward those who believe and do righteous deeds. Those will have forgiveness and noble provision.

content_ar: وَالَّذِينَ سَعَوْا فِي آيَاتِنَا مُعَاجِزِينَ أُولَٰئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مِّن رِّجْزٍ أَلِيمٌ
content_en_si: But those who strive against Our verses [seeking] to cause failure - for them will be a painful punishment of foul nature.

content_ar: وَيَرَى الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ الَّذِي أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ هُوَ الْحَقَّ وَيَهْدِي إِلَىٰ صِرَاطِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
content_en_si: And those who have been given knowledge see that what is revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, and it guides to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy.

content_ar: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا هَلْ نَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍ يُنَبِّئُكُمْ إِذَا مُزِّقْتُمْ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ إِنَّكُمْ لَفِي خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
content_en_si: But those who disbelieve say, "Shall we direct you to a man who will inform you [that] when you have disintegrated in complete disintegration, you will [then] be [recreated] in a new creation?

content_ar: أَفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَم بِهِ جِنَّةٌ ۗ بَلِ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ فِي الْعَذَابِ وَالضَّلَالِ الْبَعِيدِ
content_en_si: Has he invented about Allah a lie or is there in him madness?" Rather, they who do not believe in the Hereafter will be in the punishment and [are in] extreme error.

content_ar: أَفَلَمْ يَرَوْا إِلَىٰ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُم مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ إِن نَّشَأْ نَخْسِفْ بِهِمُ الْأَرْضَ أَوْ نُسْقِطْ عَلَيْهِمْ كِسَفًا مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِّكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
content_en_si: Then, do they not look at what is before them and what is behind them of the heaven and earth? If We should will, We could cause the earth to swallow them or [could] let fall upon them fragments from the sky. Indeed in that is a sign for every servant turning back [to Allah].

content_ar: ۞ وَلَقَدْ آتَيْنَا دَاوُودَ مِنَّا فَضْلًا ۖ يَا جِبَالُ أَوِّبِي مَعَهُ وَالطَّيْرَ ۖ وَأَلَنَّا لَهُ الْحَدِيدَ
content_en_si: And We certainly gave David from Us bounty. [We said], "O mountains, repeat [Our] praises with him, and the birds [as well]." And We made pliable for him iron,

content_ar: أَنِ اعْمَلْ سَابِغَاتٍ وَقَدِّرْ فِي السَّرْدِ ۖ وَاعْمَلُوا صَالِحًا ۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
content_en_si: [Commanding him], "Make full coats of mail and calculate [precisely] the links, and work [all of you] righteousness. Indeed I, of what you do, am Seeing."

content_ar: وَلِسُلَيْمَانَ الرِّيحَ غُدُوُّهَا شَهْرٌ وَرَوَاحُهَا شَهْرٌ ۖ وَأَسَلْنَا لَهُ عَيْنَ الْقِطْرِ ۖ وَمِنَ الْجِنِّ مَن يَعْمَلُ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِ ۖ وَمَن يَزِغْ مِنْهُمْ عَنْ أَمْرِنَا نُذِقْهُ مِنْ عَذَابِ السَّعِيرِ
content_en_si: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind - its morning [journey was that of] a month - and its afternoon [journey was that of] a month, and We made flow for him a spring of [liquid] copper. And among the jinn were those who worked for him by the permission of his Lord. And whoever deviated among them from Our command - We will make him taste of the punishment of the Blaze.

content_ar: يَعْمَلُونَ لَهُ مَا يَشَاءُ مِن مَّحَارِيبَ وَتَمَاثِيلَ وَجِفَانٍ كَالْجَوَابِ وَقُدُورٍ رَّاسِيَاتٍ ۚ اعْمَلُوا آلَ دَاوُودَ شُكْرًا ۚ وَقَلِيلٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِيَ الشَّكُورُ
content_en_si: They made for him what he willed of elevated chambers, statues, bowls like reservoirs, and stationary kettles. [We said], "Work, O family of David, in gratitude." And few of My servants are grateful.

content_ar: فَلَمَّا قَضَيْنَا عَلَيْهِ الْمَوْتَ مَا دَلَّهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَوْتِهِ إِلَّا دَابَّةُ الْأَرْضِ تَأْكُلُ مِنسَأَتَهُ ۖ فَلَمَّا خَرَّ تَبَيَّنَتِ الْجِنُّ أَن لَّوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ الْغَيْبَ مَا لَبِثُوا فِي الْعَذَابِ الْمُهِينِ
content_en_si: And when We decreed for Solomon death, nothing indicated to the jinn his death except a creature of the earth eating his staff. But when he fell, it became clear to the jinn that if they had known the unseen, they would not have remained in humiliating punishment.

content_ar: لَقَدْ كَانَ لِسَبَإٍ فِي مَسْكَنِهِمْ آيَةٌ ۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَن يَمِينٍ وَشِمَالٍ ۖ كُلُوا مِن رِّزْقِ رَبِّكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لَهُ ۚ بَلْدَةٌ طَيِّبَةٌ وَرَبٌّ غَفُورٌ
content_en_si: There was for [the tribe of] Saba' in their dwelling place a sign: two [fields of] gardens on the right and on the left. [They were told], "Eat from the provisions of your Lord and be grateful to Him. A good land [have you], and a forgiving Lord."

content_ar: فَأَعْرَضُوا فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَيْلَ الْعَرِمِ وَبَدَّلْنَاهُم بِجَنَّتَيْهِمْ جَنَّتَيْنِ ذَوَاتَيْ أُكُلٍ خَمْطٍ وَأَثْلٍ وَشَيْءٍ مِّن سِدْرٍ قَلِيلٍ
content_en_si: But they turned away [refusing], so We sent upon them the flood of the dam, and We replaced their two [fields of] gardens with gardens of bitter fruit, tamarisks and something of sparse lote trees.

content_ar: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيْنَاهُم بِمَا كَفَرُوا ۖ وَهَلْ نُجَازِي إِلَّا الْكَفُورَ
content_en_si: [By] that We repaid them because they disbelieved. And do We [thus] repay except the ungrateful?

content_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ الْقُرَى الَّتِي بَارَكْنَا فِيهَا قُرًى ظَاهِرَةً وَقَدَّرْنَا فِيهَا السَّيْرَ ۖ سِيرُوا فِيهَا لَيَالِيَ وَأَيَّامًا آمِنِينَ
content_en_si: And We placed between them and the cities which We had blessed [many] visible cities. And We determined between them the [distances of] journey, [saying], "Travel between them by night or day in safety."

content_ar: فَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا بَاعِدْ بَيْنَ أَسْفَارِنَا وَظَلَمُوا أَنفُسَهُمْ فَجَعَلْنَاهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ وَمَزَّقْنَاهُمْ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَاتٍ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٍ شَكُورٍ
content_en_si: But [insolently] they said, "Our Lord, lengthen the distance between our journeys," and wronged themselves, so We made them narrations and dispersed them in total dispersion. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ صَدَّقَ عَلَيْهِمْ إِبْلِيسُ ظَنَّهُ فَاتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقًا مِّنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
content_en_si: And Iblees had already confirmed through them his assumption, so they followed him, except for a party of believers.

content_ar: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّن سُلْطَانٍ إِلَّا لِنَعْلَمَ مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِالْآخِرَةِ مِمَّنْ هُوَ مِنْهَا فِي شَكٍّ ۗ وَرَبُّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ حَفِيظٌ
content_en_si: And he had over them no authority except [it was decreed] that We might make evident who believes in the Hereafter from who is thereof in doubt. And your Lord, over all things, is Guardian.

content_ar: قُلِ ادْعُوا الَّذِينَ زَعَمْتُم مِّن دُونِ اللَّهِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا لَهُمْ فِيهِمَا مِن شِرْكٍ وَمَا لَهُ مِنْهُم مِّن ظَهِيرٍ
content_en_si: Say, [O Muhammad], "Invoke those you claim [as deities] besides Allah." They do not possess an atom's weight [of ability] in the heavens or on the earth, and they do not have therein any partnership [with Him], nor is there for Him from among them any assistant.

content_ar: وَلَا تَنفَعُ الشَّفَاعَةُ عِندَهُ إِلَّا لِمَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ۚ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا فُزِّعَ عَن قُلُوبِهِمْ قَالُوا مَاذَا قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا الْحَقَّ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْكَبِيرُ
content_en_si: And intercession does not benefit with Him except for one whom He permits. [And those wait] until, when terror is removed from their hearts, they will say [to one another], "What has your Lord said?" They will say, "The truth." And He is the Most High, the Grand.

content_ar: ۞ قُلْ مَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ قُلِ اللَّهُ ۖ وَإِنَّا أَوْ إِيَّاكُمْ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى أَوْ فِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
content_en_si: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?" Say, "Allah. And indeed, we or you are either upon guidance or in clear error."

content_ar: قُل لَّا تُسْأَلُونَ عَمَّا أَجْرَمْنَا وَلَا نُسْأَلُ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
content_en_si: Say, "You will not be asked about what we committed, and we will not be asked about what you do."

content_ar: قُلْ يَجْمَعُ بَيْنَنَا رَبُّنَا ثُمَّ يَفْتَحُ بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَهُوَ الْفَتَّاحُ الْعَلِيمُ
content_en_si: Say, "Our Lord will bring us together; then He will judge between us in truth. And He is the Knowing Judge."

content_ar: قُلْ أَرُونِيَ الَّذِينَ أَلْحَقْتُم بِهِ شُرَكَاءَ ۖ كَلَّا ۚ بَلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
content_en_si: Say, "Show me those whom you have attached to Him as partners. No! Rather, He [alone] is Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

content_ar: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ إِلَّا كَافَّةً لِّلنَّاسِ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
content_en_si: And We have not sent you except comprehensively to mankind as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. But most of the people do not know.

content_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
content_en_si: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

content_ar: قُل لَّكُم مِّيعَادُ يَوْمٍ لَّا تَسْتَأْخِرُونَ عَنْهُ سَاعَةً وَلَا تَسْتَقْدِمُونَ
content_en_si: Say, "For you is the appointment of a Day [when] you will not remain thereafter an hour, nor will you precede [it]."

content_ar: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَن نُّؤْمِنَ بِهَٰذَا الْقُرْآنِ وَلَا بِالَّذِي بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ وَلَوْ تَرَىٰ إِذِ الظَّالِمُونَ مَوْقُوفُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ يَرْجِعُ بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ الْقَوْلَ يَقُولُ الَّذِينَ اسْتُضْعِفُوا لِلَّذِينَ اسْتَكْبَرُوا لَوْلَا أَنتُمْ لَكُنَّا مُؤْمِنِينَ
content_en_si: And those who disbelieve say, "We will never believe in this Qur'an nor in that before it." But if you could see when the wrongdoers are made to stand before their Lord, refuting each other's words... Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "If not for you, we would have been believers."

content_ar: قَالَ الَّذِينَ اسْتَكْبَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ اسْتُضْعِفُوا أَنَحْنُ صَدَدْنَاكُمْ عَنِ الْهُدَىٰ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَاءَكُم ۖ بَلْ كُنتُم مُّجْرِمِينَ
content_en_si: Those who were arrogant will say to those who were oppressed, "Did we avert you from guidance after it had come to you? Rather, you were criminals."

content_ar: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ اسْتُضْعِفُوا لِلَّذِينَ اسْتَكْبَرُوا بَلْ مَكْرُ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ إِذْ تَأْمُرُونَنَا أَن نَّكْفُرَ بِاللَّهِ وَنَجْعَلَ لَهُ أَندَادًا ۚ وَأَسَرُّوا النَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُا الْعَذَابَ وَجَعَلْنَا الْأَغْلَالَ فِي أَعْنَاقِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ هَلْ يُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
content_en_si: Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "Rather, [it was your] conspiracy of night and day when you were ordering us to disbelieve in Allah and attribute to Him equals." But they will [all] confide regret when they see the punishment; and We will put shackles on the necks of those who disbelieved. Will they be recompensed except for what they used to do?

content_ar: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا فِي قَرْيَةٍ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتْرَفُوهَا إِنَّا بِمَا أُرْسِلْتُم بِهِ كَافِرُونَ
content_en_si: And We did not send into a city any warner except that its affluent said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers."

content_ar: وَقَالُوا نَحْنُ أَكْثَرُ أَمْوَالًا وَأَوْلَادًا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
content_en_si: And they said, "We are more [than the believers] in wealth and children, and we are not to be punished."

content_ar: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيَقْدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
content_en_si: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it], but most of the people do not know."

content_ar: وَمَا أَمْوَالُكُمْ وَلَا أَوْلَادُكُم بِالَّتِي تُقَرِّبُكُمْ عِندَنَا زُلْفَىٰ إِلَّا مَنْ آمَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا فَأُولَٰئِكَ لَهُمْ جَزَاءُ الضِّعْفِ بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَهُمْ فِي الْغُرُفَاتِ آمِنُونَ
content_en_si: And it is not your wealth or your children that bring you nearer to Us in position, but it is [by being] one who has believed and done righteousness. For them there will be the double reward for what they did, and they will be in the upper chambers [of Paradise], safe [and secure].

content_ar: وَالَّذِينَ يَسْعَوْنَ فِي آيَاتِنَا مُعَاجِزِينَ أُولَٰئِكَ فِي الْعَذَابِ مُحْضَرُونَ
content_en_si: And the ones who strive against Our verses to cause [them] failure - those will be brought into the punishment [to remain].

content_ar: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ وَيَقْدِرُ لَهُ ۚ وَمَا أَنفَقْتُم مِّن شَيْءٍ فَهُوَ يُخْلِفُهُ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ الرَّازِقِينَ
content_en_si: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts [it] for him. But whatever thing you spend [in His cause] - He will compensate it; and He is the best of providers."

content_ar: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ أَهَٰؤُلَاءِ إِيَّاكُمْ كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
content_en_si: And [mention] the Day when He will gather them all and then say to the angels, "Did these [people] used to worship you?"

content_ar: قَالُوا سُبْحَانَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِم ۖ بَلْ كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ الْجِنَّ ۖ أَكْثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤْمِنُونَ
content_en_si: They will say, "Exalted are You! You, [O Allah], are our benefactor not them. Rather, they used to worship the jinn; most of them were believers in them."

content_ar: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا يَمْلِكُ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ نَّفْعًا وَلَا ضَرًّا وَنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذُوقُوا عَذَابَ النَّارِ الَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
content_en_si: But today you do not hold for one another [the power of] benefit or harm, and We will say to those who wronged, "Taste the punishment of the Fire, which you used to deny."

content_ar: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ آيَاتُنَا بَيِّنَاتٍ قَالُوا مَا هَٰذَا إِلَّا رَجُلٌ يُرِيدُ أَن يَصُدَّكُمْ عَمَّا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ آبَاؤُكُمْ وَقَالُوا مَا هَٰذَا إِلَّا إِفْكٌ مُّفْتَرًى ۚ وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
content_en_si: And when our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, they say, "This is not but a man who wishes to avert you from that which your fathers were worshipping." And they say, "This is not except a lie invented." And those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is not but obvious magic."

content_ar: وَمَا آتَيْنَاهُم مِّن كُتُبٍ يَدْرُسُونَهَا ۖ وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمْ قَبْلَكَ مِن نَّذِيرٍ
content_en_si: And We had not given them any scriptures which they could study, and We had not sent to them before you, [O Muhammad], any warner.

content_ar: وَكَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَمَا بَلَغُوا مِعْشَارَ مَا آتَيْنَاهُمْ فَكَذَّبُوا رُسُلِي ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
content_en_si: And those before them denied, and the people of Makkah have not attained a tenth of what We had given them. But the former peoples denied My messengers, so how [terrible] was My reproach.

content_ar: ۞ قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَعِظُكُم بِوَاحِدَةٍ ۖ أَن تَقُومُوا لِلَّهِ مَثْنَىٰ وَفُرَادَىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّرُوا ۚ مَا بِصَاحِبِكُم مِّن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ لَّكُم بَيْنَ يَدَيْ عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ
content_en_si: Say, "I only advise you of one [thing] - that you stand for Allah, [seeking truth] in pairs and individually, and then give thought." There is not in your companion any madness. He is only a warner to you before a severe punishment.

content_ar: قُلْ مَا سَأَلْتُكُم مِّنْ أَجْرٍ فَهُوَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
content_en_si: Say, "Whatever payment I might have asked of you - it is yours. My payment is only from Allah, and He is, over all things, Witness."

content_ar: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقْذِفُ بِالْحَقِّ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوبِ
content_en_si: Say, "Indeed, my Lord projects the truth. Knower of the unseen."

content_ar: قُلْ جَاءَ الْحَقُّ وَمَا يُبْدِئُ الْبَاطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
content_en_si: Say, "The truth has come, and falsehood can neither begin [anything] nor repeat [it]."

content_ar: قُلْ إِن ضَلَلْتُ فَإِنَّمَا أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِي ۖ وَإِنِ اهْتَدَيْتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِي إِلَيَّ رَبِّي ۚ إِنَّهُ سَمِيعٌ قَرِيبٌ
content_en_si: Say, "If I should err, I would only err against myself. But if I am guided, it is by what my Lord reveals to me. Indeed, He is Hearing and near."

content_ar: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰ إِذْ فَزِعُوا فَلَا فَوْتَ وَأُخِذُوا مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
content_en_si: And if you could see when they are terrified but there is no escape, and they will be seized from a place nearby.

content_ar: وَقَالُوا آمَنَّا بِهِ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ التَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ
content_en_si: And they will [then] say, "We believe in it!" But how for them will be the taking [of faith] from a place far away?

content_ar: وَقَدْ كَفَرُوا بِهِ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَيَقْذِفُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ مِن مَّكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ
content_en_si: And they had already disbelieved in it before and would assault the unseen from a place far away.

content_ar: وَحِيلَ بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ مَا يَشْتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشْيَاعِهِم مِّن قَبْلُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا فِي شَكٍّ مُّرِيبٍ
content_en_si: And prevention will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their kind before. Indeed, they were in disquieting denial.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ جَاعِلِ الْمَلَائِكَةِ رُسُلًا أُولِي أَجْنِحَةٍ مَّثْنَىٰ وَثُلَاثَ وَرُبَاعَ ۚ يَزِيدُ فِي الْخَلْقِ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
content_en_si: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, [who] made the angels messengers having wings, two or three or four. He increases in creation what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.

content_ar: مَّا يَفْتَحِ اللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ مِن رَّحْمَةٍ فَلَا مُمْسِكَ لَهَا ۖ وَمَا يُمْسِكْ فَلَا مُرْسِلَ لَهُ مِن بَعْدِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
content_en_si: Whatever Allah grants to people of mercy - none can withhold it; and whatever He withholds - none can release it thereafter. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ هَلْ مِنْ خَالِقٍ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤْفَكُونَ
content_en_si: O mankind, remember the favor of Allah upon you. Is there any creator other than Allah who provides for you from the heaven and earth? There is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?

content_ar: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كُذِّبَتْ رُسُلٌ مِّن قَبْلِكَ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ
content_en_si: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - already were messengers denied before you. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِاللَّهِ الْغَرُورُ
content_en_si: O mankind, indeed the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver.

content_ar: إِنَّ الشَّيْطَانَ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ فَاتَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّا ۚ إِنَّمَا يَدْعُو حِزْبَهُ لِيَكُونُوا مِنْ أَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ
content_en_si: Indeed, Satan is an enemy to you; so take him as an enemy. He only invites his party to be among the companions of the Blaze.

content_ar: الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
content_en_si: Those who disbelieve will have a severe punishment, and those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and great reward.

content_ar: أَفَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ فَرَآهُ حَسَنًا ۖ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۖ فَلَا تَذْهَبْ نَفْسُكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَسَرَاتٍ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ بِمَا يَصْنَعُونَ
content_en_si: Then is one to whom the evil of his deed has been made attractive so he considers it good [like one rightly guided]? For indeed, Allah sends astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. So do not let yourself perish over them in regret. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do.

content_ar: وَاللَّهُ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ الرِّيَاحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابًا فَسُقْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٍ مَّيِّتٍ فَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ النُّشُورُ
content_en_si: And it is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds, and We drive them to a dead land and give life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Thus is the resurrection.

content_ar: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ الْعِزَّةَ فَلِلَّهِ الْعِزَّةُ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِلَيْهِ يَصْعَدُ الْكَلِمُ الطَّيِّبُ وَالْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ يَرْفَعُهُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ يَمْكُرُونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَمَكْرُ أُولَٰئِكَ هُوَ يَبُورُ
content_en_si: Whoever desires honor [through power] - then to Allah belongs all honor. To Him ascends good speech, and righteous work raises it. But they who plot evil deeds will have a severe punishment, and the plotting of those - it will perish.

content_ar: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ۚ وَمَا تَحْمِلُ مِنْ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلْمِهِ ۚ وَمَا يُعَمَّرُ مِن مُّعَمَّرٍ وَلَا يُنقَصُ مِنْ عُمُرِهِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
content_en_si: And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop; then He made you mates. And no female conceives nor does she give birth except with His knowledge. And no aged person is granted [additional] life nor is his lifespan lessened but that it is in a register. Indeed, that for Allah is easy.

content_ar: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْبَحْرَانِ هَٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ سَائِغٌ شَرَابُهُ وَهَٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ ۖ وَمِن كُلٍّ تَأْكُلُونَ لَحْمًا طَرِيًّا وَتَسْتَخْرِجُونَ حِلْيَةً تَلْبَسُونَهَا ۖ وَتَرَى الْفُلْكَ فِيهِ مَوَاخِرَ لِتَبْتَغُوا مِن فَضْلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
content_en_si: And not alike are the two bodies of water. One is fresh and sweet, palatable for drinking, and one is salty and bitter. And from each you eat tender meat and extract ornaments which you wear, and you see the ships plowing through [them] that you might seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.

content_ar: يُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ مَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِن قِطْمِيرٍ
content_en_si: He causes the night to enter the day, and He causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon - each running [its course] for a specified term. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. And those whom you invoke other than Him do not possess [as much as] the membrane of a date seed.

content_ar: إِن تَدْعُوهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُوا دُعَاءَكُمْ وَلَوْ سَمِعُوا مَا اسْتَجَابُوا لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ يَكْفُرُونَ بِشِرْكِكُمْ ۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثْلُ خَبِيرٍ
content_en_si: If you invoke them, they do not hear your supplication; and if they heard, they would not respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your association. And none can inform you like [one] Acquainted [with all matters].

content_ar: ۞ يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ أَنتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ الْحَمِيدُ
content_en_si: O mankind, you are those in need of Allah, while Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

content_ar: إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَيَأْتِ بِخَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
content_en_si: If He wills, He can do away with you and bring forth a new creation.

content_ar: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٍ
content_en_si: And that is for Allah not difficult.

content_ar: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۚ وَإِن تَدْعُ مُثْقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمْلِهَا لَا يُحْمَلْ مِنْهُ شَيْءٌ وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبَىٰ ۗ إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِالْغَيْبِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ ۚ وَمَن تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفْسِهِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ الْمَصِيرُ
content_en_si: And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And if a heavily laden soul calls [another] to [carry some of] its load, nothing of it will be carried, even if he should be a close relative. You can only warn those who fear their Lord unseen and have established prayer. And whoever purifies himself only purifies himself for [the benefit of] his soul. And to Allah is the [final] destination.

content_ar: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَعْمَىٰ وَالْبَصِيرُ
content_en_si: Not equal are the blind and the seeing,

content_ar: وَلَا الظُّلُمَاتُ وَلَا النُّورُ
content_en_si: Nor are the darknesses and the light,

content_ar: وَلَا الظِّلُّ وَلَا الْحَرُورُ
content_en_si: Nor are the shade and the heat,

content_ar: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَحْيَاءُ وَلَا الْأَمْوَاتُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُسْمِعُ مَن يَشَاءُ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ بِمُسْمِعٍ مَّن فِي الْقُبُورِ
content_en_si: And not equal are the living and the dead. Indeed, Allah causes to hear whom He wills, but you cannot make hear those in the graves.

content_ar: إِنْ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
content_en_si: You, [O Muhammad], are not but a warner.

content_ar: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ بِالْحَقِّ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا ۚ وَإِن مِّنْ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And there was no nation but that there had passed within it a warner.

content_ar: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ جَاءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ وَبِالزُّبُرِ وَبِالْكِتَابِ الْمُنِيرِ
content_en_si: And if they deny you - then already have those before them denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs and written ordinances and with the enlightening Scripture.

content_ar: ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
content_en_si: Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

content_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ ثَمَرَاتٍ مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَانُهَا ۚ وَمِنَ الْجِبَالِ جُدَدٌ بِيضٌ وَحُمْرٌ مُّخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌ
content_en_si: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and We produce thereby fruits of varying colors? And in the mountains are tracts, white and red of varying shades and [some] extremely black.

content_ar: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ وَالدَّوَابِّ وَالْأَنْعَامِ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهُ كَذَٰلِكَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى اللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ الْعُلَمَاءُ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ
content_en_si: And among people and moving creatures and grazing livestock are various colors similarly. Only those fear Allah, from among His servants, who have knowledge. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Forgiving.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ كِتَابَ اللَّهِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَأَنفَقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً يَرْجُونَ تِجَارَةً لَّن تَبُورَ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who recite the Book of Allah and establish prayer and spend [in His cause] out of what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, [can] expect a profit that will never perish -

content_ar: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ غَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
content_en_si: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative.

content_ar: وَالَّذِي أَوْحَيْنَا إِلَيْكَ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ هُوَ الْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِ لَخَبِيرٌ بَصِيرٌ
content_en_si: And that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of the Book is the truth, confirming what was before it. Indeed, Allah, of His servants, is Acquainted and Seeing.

content_ar: ثُمَّ أَوْرَثْنَا الْكِتَابَ الَّذِينَ اصْطَفَيْنَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۖ فَمِنْهُمْ ظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِ وَمِنْهُم مُّقْتَصِدٌ وَمِنْهُمْ سَابِقٌ بِالْخَيْرَاتِ بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَضْلُ الْكَبِيرُ
content_en_si: Then we caused to inherit the Book those We have chosen of Our servants; and among them is he who wrongs himself, and among them is he who is moderate, and among them is he who is foremost in good deeds by permission of Allah. That [inheritance] is what is the great bounty.

content_ar: جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ يَدْخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤْلُؤًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌ
content_en_si: [For them are] gardens of perpetual residence which they will enter. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their garments therein will be silk.

content_ar: وَقَالُوا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا الْحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
content_en_si: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has removed from us [all] sorrow. Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative -

content_ar: الَّذِي أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ الْمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضْلِهِ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٌ
content_en_si: He who has settled us in the home of duration out of His bounty. There touches us not in it any fatigue, and there touches us not in it weariness [of mind]."

content_ar: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يُقْضَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ فَيَمُوتُوا وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُم مِّنْ عَذَابِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي كُلَّ كَفُورٍ
content_en_si: And for those who disbelieve will be the fire of Hell. [Death] is not decreed for them so they may die, nor will its torment be lightened for them. Thus do we recompense every ungrateful one.

content_ar: وَهُمْ يَصْطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَا أَخْرِجْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا غَيْرَ الَّذِي كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَمْ نُعَمِّرْكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَاءَكُمُ النَّذِيرُ ۖ فَذُوقُوا فَمَا لِلظَّالِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
content_en_si: And they will cry out therein, "Our Lord, remove us; we will do righteousness - other than what we were doing!" But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you? So taste [the punishment], for there is not for the wrongdoers any helper.

content_ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَالِمُ غَيْبِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
content_en_si: Indeed, Allah is Knower of the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and earth. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

content_ar: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَائِفَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيْهِ كُفْرُهُ ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا مَقْتًا ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
content_en_si: It is He who has made you successors upon the earth. And whoever disbelieves - upon him will be [the consequence of] his disbelief. And the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them in the sight of their Lord except in hatred; and the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them except in loss.

content_ar: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ شُرَكَاءَكُمُ الَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُوا مِنَ الْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ أَمْ آتَيْنَاهُمْ كِتَابًا فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٍ مِّنْهُ ۚ بَلْ إِن يَعِدُ الظَّالِمُونَ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا
content_en_si: Say, "Have you considered your 'partners' whom you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created from the earth, or have they partnership [with Him] in the heavens? Or have We given them a book so they are [standing] on evidence therefrom? [No], rather, the wrongdoers do not promise each other except delusion."

content_ar: ۞ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُمْسِكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ أَن تَزُولَا ۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَا إِنْ أَمْسَكَهُمَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِّن بَعْدِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا
content_en_si: Indeed, Allah holds the heavens and the earth, lest they cease. And if they should cease, no one could hold them [in place] after Him. Indeed, He is Forbearing and Forgiving.

content_ar: وَأَقْسَمُوا بِاللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَانِهِمْ لَئِن جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ لَّيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى الْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ مَّا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا
content_en_si: And they swore by Allah their strongest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than [any] one of the [previous] nations. But when a warner came to them, it did not increase them except in aversion.

content_ar: اسْتِكْبَارًا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ السَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ الْمَكْرُ السَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ الْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا
content_en_si: [Due to] arrogance in the land and plotting of evil; but the evil plot does not encompass except its own people. Then do they await except the way of the former peoples? But you will never find in the way of Allah any change, and you will never find in the way of Allah any alteration.

content_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوا أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُ مِن شَيْءٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَلِيمًا قَدِيرًا
content_en_si: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? And they were greater than them in power. But Allah is not to be caused failure by anything in the heavens or on the earth. Indeed, He is ever Knowing and Competent.

content_ar: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ اللَّهُ النَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِن دَابَّةٍ وَلَٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَاءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِ بَصِيرًا
content_en_si: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon the earth any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed Allah has ever been, of His servants, Seeing.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يس
content_en_si: Ya, Seen.

content_ar: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ
content_en_si: By the wise Qur'an.

content_ar: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,

content_ar: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
content_en_si: On a straight path.

content_ar: تَنزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
content_en_si: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,

content_ar: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّا أُنذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
content_en_si: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.

content_ar: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
content_en_si: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.

content_ar: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
content_en_si: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.

content_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا مِن بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
content_en_si: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.

content_ar: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
content_en_si: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.

content_ar: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
content_en_si: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.

content_ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.

content_ar: وَاضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَابَ الْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَاءَهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
content_en_si: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it -

content_ar: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمُ اثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
content_en_si: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."

content_ar: قَالُوا مَا أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَا أَنزَلَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ مِن شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
content_en_si: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."

content_ar: قَالُوا رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
content_en_si: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,

content_ar: وَمَا عَلَيْنَا إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
content_en_si: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."

content_ar: قَالُوا إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
content_en_si: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."

content_ar: قَالُوا طَائِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
content_en_si: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."

content_ar: وَجَاءَ مِنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اتَّبِعُوا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
content_en_si: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.

content_ar: اتَّبِعُوا مَن لَّا يَسْأَلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
content_en_si: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.

content_ar: وَمَا لِيَ لَا أَعْبُدُ الَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
content_en_si: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?

content_ar: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِ آلِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
content_en_si: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?

content_ar: إِنِّي إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.

content_ar: إِنِّي آمَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاسْمَعُونِ
content_en_si: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."

content_ar: قِيلَ ادْخُلِ الْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَا لَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ
content_en_si: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

content_ar: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
content_en_si: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."

content_ar: ۞ وَمَا أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ مِن بَعْدِهِ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
content_en_si: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.

content_ar: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَامِدُونَ
content_en_si: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.

content_ar: يَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى الْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
content_en_si: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.

content_ar: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ الْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
content_en_si: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?

content_ar: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
content_en_si: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us.

content_ar: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ الْأَرْضُ الْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَاهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
content_en_si: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.

content_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّاتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ الْعُيُونِ
content_en_si: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -

content_ar: لِيَأْكُلُوا مِن ثَمَرِهِ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
content_en_si: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?

content_ar: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
content_en_si: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.

content_ar: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ اللَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ النَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
content_en_si: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.

content_ar: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ الْعَزِيزِ الْعَلِيمِ
content_en_si: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

content_ar: وَالْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ
content_en_si: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.

content_ar: لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنبَغِي لَهَا أَن تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
content_en_si: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming.

content_ar: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
content_en_si: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship.

content_ar: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
content_en_si: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride.

content_ar: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
content_en_si: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved

content_ar: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَاعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
content_en_si: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time.

content_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقُوا مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
content_en_si: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy... "

content_ar: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ آيَةٍ مِّنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
content_en_si: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away.

content_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
content_en_si: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error."

content_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
content_en_si: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

content_ar: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
content_en_si: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing.

content_ar: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
content_en_si: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.

content_ar: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
content_en_si: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten.

content_ar: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا مَن بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
content_en_si: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth."

content_ar: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
content_en_si: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us.

content_ar: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْئًا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
content_en_si: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do.

content_ar: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهُونَ
content_en_si: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -

content_ar: هُمْ وَأَزْوَاجُهُمْ فِي ظِلَالٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكِئُونَ
content_en_si: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.

content_ar: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
content_en_si: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]

content_ar: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
content_en_si: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord.

content_ar: وَامْتَازُوا الْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
content_en_si: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals.

content_ar: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَا بَنِي آدَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
content_en_si: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -

content_ar: وَأَنِ اعْبُدُونِي ۚ هَٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
content_en_si: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ
content_en_si: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?

content_ar: هَٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
content_en_si: This is the Hellfire which you were promised.

content_ar: اصْلَوْهَا الْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
content_en_si: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny."

content_ar: الْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَا أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
content_en_si: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn.

content_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَاطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
content_en_si: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?

content_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
content_en_si: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.

content_ar: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِي الْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
content_en_si: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand?

content_ar: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَاهُ الشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنبَغِي لَهُ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْآنٌ مُّبِينٌ
content_en_si: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an

content_ar: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
content_en_si: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers.

content_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَا أَنْعَامًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَالِكُونَ
content_en_si: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?

content_ar: وَذَلَّلْنَاهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
content_en_si: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat.

content_ar: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
content_en_si: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?

content_ar: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
content_en_si: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.

content_ar: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
content_en_si: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.

content_ar: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
content_en_si: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.

content_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنسَانُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
content_en_si: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?

content_ar: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلْقَهُ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْيِي الْعِظَامَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٌ
content_en_si: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"

content_ar: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِي أَنشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
content_en_si: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."

content_ar: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَا أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
content_en_si: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite.

content_ar: أَوَلَيْسَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيمُ
content_en_si: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.

content_ar: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكُونُ
content_en_si: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is.

content_ar: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
content_en_si: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالصَّافَّاتِ صَفًّا
content_en_si: By those [angels] lined up in rows

content_ar: فَالزَّاجِرَاتِ زَجْرًا
content_en_si: And those who drive [the clouds]

content_ar: فَالتَّالِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
content_en_si: And those who recite the message,

content_ar: إِنَّ إِلَٰهَكُمْ لَوَاحِدٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, your God is One,

content_ar: رَّبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ الْمَشَارِقِ
content_en_si: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.

content_ar: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ الْكَوَاكِبِ
content_en_si: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

content_ar: وَحِفْظًا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ مَّارِدٍ
content_en_si: And as protection against every rebellious devil

content_ar: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
content_en_si: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,

content_ar: دُحُورًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ
content_en_si: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,

content_ar: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ الْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
content_en_si: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].

content_ar: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَا ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍ
content_en_si: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.

content_ar: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
content_en_si: But you wonder, while they mock,

content_ar: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
content_en_si: And when they are reminded, they remember not.

content_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا آيَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
content_en_si: And when they see a sign, they ridicule

content_ar: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
content_en_si: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.

content_ar: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
content_en_si: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

content_ar: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ
content_en_si: And our forefathers [as well]?"

content_ar: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَاخِرُونَ
content_en_si: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."

content_ar: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
content_en_si: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.

content_ar: وَقَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
content_en_si: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."

content_ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
content_en_si: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."

content_ar: ۞ احْشُرُوا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
content_en_si: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship

content_ar: مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ فَاهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطِ الْجَحِيمِ
content_en_si: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire

content_ar: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْئُولُونَ
content_en_si: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."

content_ar: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
content_en_si: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"

content_ar: بَلْ هُمُ الْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
content_en_si: But they, that Day, are in surrender.

content_ar: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
content_en_si: And they will approach one another blaming each other.

content_ar: قَالُوا إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ الْيَمِينِ
content_en_si: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."

content_ar: قَالُوا بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا مُؤْمِنِينَ
content_en_si: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,

content_ar: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَانٍ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَاغِينَ
content_en_si: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.

content_ar: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَا ۖ إِنَّا لَذَائِقُونَ
content_en_si: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].

content_ar: فَأَغْوَيْنَاكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَاوِينَ
content_en_si: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."

content_ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِي الْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
content_en_si: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.

content_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.

content_ar: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
content_en_si: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant

content_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُو آلِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍ
content_en_si: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"

content_ar: بَلْ جَاءَ بِالْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
content_en_si: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.

content_ar: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَائِقُو الْعَذَابِ الْأَلِيمِ
content_en_si: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,

content_ar: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
content_en_si: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -

content_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
content_en_si: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

content_ar: أُولَٰئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
content_en_si: Those will have a provision determined -

content_ar: فَوَاكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ
content_en_si: Fruits; and they will be honored

content_ar: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
content_en_si: In gardens of pleasure

content_ar: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَابِلِينَ
content_en_si: On thrones facing one another.

content_ar: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍ
content_en_si: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,

content_ar: بَيْضَاءَ لَذَّةٍ لِّلشَّارِبِينَ
content_en_si: White and delicious to the drinkers;

content_ar: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
content_en_si: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.

content_ar: وَعِندَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ عِينٌ
content_en_si: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,

content_ar: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
content_en_si: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.

content_ar: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
content_en_si: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

content_ar: قَالَ قَائِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٌ
content_en_si: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]

content_ar: يَقُولُ أَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُصَدِّقِينَ
content_en_si: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

content_ar: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
content_en_si: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"

content_ar: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ
content_en_si: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"

content_ar: فَاطَّلَعَ فَرَآهُ فِي سَوَاءِ الْجَحِيمِ
content_en_si: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.

content_ar: قَالَ تَاللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ
content_en_si: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.

content_ar: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ الْمُحْضَرِينَ
content_en_si: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].

content_ar: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
content_en_si: Then, are we not to die

content_ar: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
content_en_si: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"

content_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
content_en_si: Indeed, this is the great attainment.

content_ar: لِمِثْلِ هَٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ الْعَامِلُونَ
content_en_si: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.

content_ar: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّومِ
content_en_si: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?

content_ar: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاهَا فِتْنَةً لِّلظَّالِمِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.

content_ar: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِي أَصْلِ الْجَحِيمِ
content_en_si: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,

content_ar: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُ رُءُوسُ الشَّيَاطِينِ
content_en_si: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.

content_ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَآكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
content_en_si: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.

content_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
content_en_si: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.

content_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى الْجَحِيمِ
content_en_si: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.

content_ar: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا آبَاءَهُمْ ضَالِّينَ
content_en_si: Indeed they found their fathers astray.

content_ar: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
content_en_si: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
content_en_si: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
content_en_si: And We had already sent among them warners.

content_ar: فَانظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
content_en_si: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -

content_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
content_en_si: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ نَادَانَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ الْمُجِيبُونَ
content_en_si: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.

content_ar: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
content_en_si: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.

content_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُ هُمُ الْبَاقِينَ
content_en_si: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]

content_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
content_en_si: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

content_ar: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِي الْعَالَمِينَ
content_en_si: Peace upon Noah among the worlds.

content_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

content_ar: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

content_ar: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
content_en_si: Then We drowned the disbelievers.

content_ar: ۞ وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِ لَإِبْرَاهِيمَ
content_en_si: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,

content_ar: إِذْ جَاءَ رَبَّهُ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
content_en_si: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart

content_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
content_en_si: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?

content_ar: أَئِفْكًا آلِهَةً دُونَ اللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
content_en_si: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?

content_ar: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
content_en_si: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"

content_ar: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِي النُّجُومِ
content_en_si: And he cast a look at the stars

content_ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّي سَقِيمٌ
content_en_si: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."

content_ar: فَتَوَلَّوْا عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
content_en_si: So they turned away from him, departing.

content_ar: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ آلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
content_en_si: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?

content_ar: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ
content_en_si: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"

content_ar: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًا بِالْيَمِينِ
content_en_si: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.

content_ar: فَأَقْبَلُوا إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
content_en_si: Then the people came toward him, hastening.

content_ar: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
content_en_si: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,

content_ar: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
content_en_si: While Allah created you and that which you do?"

content_ar: قَالُوا ابْنُوا لَهُ بُنْيَانًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِي الْجَحِيمِ
content_en_si: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."

content_ar: فَأَرَادُوا بِهِ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَاهُمُ الْأَسْفَلِينَ
content_en_si: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.

content_ar: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ
content_en_si: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.

content_ar: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
content_en_si: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."

content_ar: فَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِغُلَامٍ حَلِيمٍ
content_en_si: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.

content_ar: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ السَّعْيَ قَالَ يَا بُنَيَّ إِنِّي أَرَىٰ فِي الْمَنَامِ أَنِّي أَذْبَحُكَ فَانظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَا أَبَتِ افْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِي إِن شَاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصَّابِرِينَ
content_en_si: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."

content_ar: فَلَمَّا أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُ لِلْجَبِينِ
content_en_si: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,

content_ar: وَنَادَيْنَاهُ أَن يَا إِبْرَاهِيمُ
content_en_si: We called to him, "O Abraham,

content_ar: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ الرُّؤْيَا ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
content_en_si: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

content_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ الْبَلَاءُ الْمُبِينُ
content_en_si: Indeed, this was the clear trial.

content_ar: وَفَدَيْنَاهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ
content_en_si: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

content_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
content_en_si: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

content_ar: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
content_en_si: Peace upon Abraham.

content_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

content_ar: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

content_ar: وَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِإِسْحَاقَ نَبِيًّا مِّنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
content_en_si: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.

content_ar: وَبَارَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ إِسْحَاقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِ مُبِينٌ
content_en_si: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
content_en_si: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.

content_ar: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
content_en_si: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,

content_ar: وَنَصَرْنَاهُمْ فَكَانُوا هُمُ الْغَالِبِينَ
content_en_si: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.

content_ar: وَآتَيْنَاهُمَا الْكِتَابَ الْمُسْتَبِينَ
content_en_si: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,

content_ar: وَهَدَيْنَاهُمَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
content_en_si: And We guided them on the straight path.

content_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِي الْآخِرِينَ
content_en_si: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:

content_ar: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
content_en_si: Peace upon Moses and Aaron.

content_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

content_ar: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.

content_ar: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
content_en_si: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,

content_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
content_en_si: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?

content_ar: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ الْخَالِقِينَ
content_en_si: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -

content_ar: اللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
content_en_si: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"

content_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
content_en_si: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],

content_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
content_en_si: Except the chosen servants of Allah.

content_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
content_en_si: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

content_ar: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
content_en_si: Peace upon Elias.

content_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

content_ar: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
content_en_si: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

content_ar: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَّمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
content_en_si: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.

content_ar: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
content_en_si: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,

content_ar: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِي الْغَابِرِينَ
content_en_si: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].

content_ar: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
content_en_si: Then We destroyed the others.

content_ar: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ
content_en_si: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning

content_ar: وَبِاللَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
content_en_si: And at night. Then will you not use reason?

content_ar: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
content_en_si: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.

content_ar: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
content_en_si: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.

content_ar: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ الْمُدْحَضِينَ
content_en_si: And he drew lots and was among the losers.

content_ar: فَالْتَقَمَهُ الْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
content_en_si: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.

content_ar: فَلَوْلَا أَنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُسَبِّحِينَ
content_en_si: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,

content_ar: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
content_en_si: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

content_ar: ۞ فَنَبَذْنَاهُ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ
content_en_si: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.

content_ar: وَأَنبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِّن يَقْطِينٍ
content_en_si: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.

content_ar: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
content_en_si: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.

content_ar: فَآمَنُوا فَمَتَّعْنَاهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
content_en_si: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.

content_ar: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ الْبَنُونَ
content_en_si: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?

content_ar: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةَ إِنَاثًا وَهُمْ شَاهِدُونَ
content_en_si: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"

content_ar: أَلَا إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
content_en_si: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,

content_ar: وَلَدَ اللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَاذِبُونَ
content_en_si: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.

content_ar: أَصْطَفَى الْبَنَاتِ عَلَى الْبَنِينَ
content_en_si: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

content_ar: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
content_en_si: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?

content_ar: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
content_en_si: Then will you not be reminded?

content_ar: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
content_en_si: Or do you have a clear authority?

content_ar: فَأْتُوا بِكِتَابِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
content_en_si: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.

content_ar: وَجَعَلُوا بَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
content_en_si: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].

content_ar: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
content_en_si: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,

content_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
content_en_si: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].

content_ar: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
content_en_si: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,

content_ar: مَا أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَاتِنِينَ
content_en_si: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him

content_ar: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ الْجَحِيمِ
content_en_si: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.

content_ar: وَمَا مِنَّا إِلَّا لَهُ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
content_en_si: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.

content_ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الصَّافُّونَ
content_en_si: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].

content_ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْمُسَبِّحُونَ
content_en_si: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."

content_ar: وَإِن كَانُوا لَيَقُولُونَ
content_en_si: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,

content_ar: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
content_en_si: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,

content_ar: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
content_en_si: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."

content_ar: فَكَفَرُوا بِهِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
content_en_si: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
content_en_si: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,

content_ar: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ الْمَنصُورُونَ
content_en_si: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory

content_ar: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ الْغَالِبُونَ
content_en_si: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.

content_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
content_en_si: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.

content_ar: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
content_en_si: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.

content_ar: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
content_en_si: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?

content_ar: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
content_en_si: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.

content_ar: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
content_en_si: And leave them for a time.

content_ar: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
content_en_si: And see, for they are going to see.

content_ar: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
content_en_si: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.

content_ar: وَسَلَامٌ عَلَى الْمُرْسَلِينَ
content_en_si: And peace upon the messengers.

content_ar: وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
content_en_si: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ص ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ ذِي الذِّكْرِ
content_en_si: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder...

content_ar: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
content_en_si: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.
