content_en_si: He will guide them and amend their condition

content_ar: وَيُدْخِلُهُمُ الْجَنَّةَ عَرَّفَهَا لَهُمْ
content_en_si: And admit them to Paradise, which He has made known to them.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن تَنصُرُوا اللَّهَ يَنصُرْكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَكُمْ
content_en_si: O you who have believed, if you support Allah, He will support you and plant firmly your feet.

content_ar: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَتَعْسًا لَّهُمْ وَأَضَلَّ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
content_en_si: But those who disbelieve - for them is misery, and He will waste their deeds.

content_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَرِهُوا مَا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
content_en_si: That is because they disliked what Allah revealed, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

content_ar: ۞ أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ دَمَّرَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ أَمْثَالُهَا
content_en_si: Have they not traveled through the land and seen how was the end of those before them? Allah destroyed [everything] over them, and for the disbelievers is something comparable.

content_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ مَوْلَى الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَأَنَّ الْكَافِرِينَ لَا مَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
content_en_si: That is because Allah is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector.

content_ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأْكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأْكُلُ الْأَنْعَامُ وَالنَّارُ مَثْوًى لَّهُمْ
content_en_si: Indeed, Allah will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow, but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat, and the Fire will be a residence for them.

content_ar: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ هِيَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةً مِّن قَرْيَتِكَ الَّتِي أَخْرَجَتْكَ أَهْلَكْنَاهُمْ فَلَا نَاصِرَ لَهُمْ
content_en_si: And how many a city was stronger than your city [Makkah] which drove you out? We destroyed them; and there was no helper for them.

content_ar: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُم
content_en_si: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their [own] desires?

content_ar: مَّثَلُ الْجَنَّةِ الَّتِي وُعِدَ الْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ فِيهَا أَنْهَارٌ مِّن مَّاءٍ غَيْرِ آسِنٍ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِّن لَّبَنٍ لَّمْ يَتَغَيَّرْ طَعْمُهُ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِّنْ خَمْرٍ لَّذَّةٍ لِّلشَّارِبِينَ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِّنْ عَسَلٍ مُّصَفًّى ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ الثَّمَرَاتِ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ كَمَنْ هُوَ خَالِدٌ فِي النَّارِ وَسُقُوا مَاءً حَمِيمًا فَقَطَّعَ أَمْعَاءَهُمْ
content_en_si: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered, rivers of milk the taste of which never changes, rivers of wine delicious to those who drink, and rivers of purified honey, in which they will have from all [kinds of] fruits and forgiveness from their Lord, like [that of] those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines?

content_ar: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَسْتَمِعُ إِلَيْكَ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا خَرَجُوا مِنْ عِندِكَ قَالُوا لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ مَاذَا قَالَ آنِفًا ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ طَبَعَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ
content_en_si: And among them, [O Muhammad], are those who listen to you, until when they depart from you, they say to those who were given knowledge, "What has he said just now?" Those are the ones of whom Allah has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their [own] desires.

content_ar: وَالَّذِينَ اهْتَدَوْا زَادَهُمْ هُدًى وَآتَاهُمْ تَقْوَاهُمْ
content_en_si: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.

content_ar: فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا السَّاعَةَ أَن تَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً ۖ فَقَدْ جَاءَ أَشْرَاطُهَا ۚ فَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمْ إِذَا جَاءَتْهُمْ ذِكْرَاهُمْ
content_en_si: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly? But already there have come [some of] its indications. Then what good to them, when it has come, will be their remembrance?

content_ar: فَاعْلَمْ أَنَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاسْتَغْفِرْ لِذَنبِكَ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمْ وَمَثْوَاكُمْ
content_en_si: So know, [O Muhammad], that there is no deity except Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women. And Allah knows of your movement and your resting place.

content_ar: وَيَقُولُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَوْلَا نُزِّلَتْ سُورَةٌ ۖ فَإِذَا أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ مُّحْكَمَةٌ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا الْقِتَالُ ۙ رَأَيْتَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ نَظَرَ الْمَغْشِيِّ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْمَوْتِ ۖ فَأَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
content_en_si: Those who believe say, "Why has a surah not been sent down? But when a precise surah is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein, you see those in whose hearts is hypocrisy looking at you with a look of one overcome by death. And more appropriate for them [would have been]

content_ar: طَاعَةٌ وَقَوْلٌ مَّعْرُوفٌ ۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ الْأَمْرُ فَلَوْ صَدَقُوا اللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ
content_en_si: Obedience and good words. And when the matter [of fighting] was determined, if they had been true to Allah, it would have been better for them.

content_ar: فَهَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ أَن تُفْسِدُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوا أَرْحَامَكُمْ
content_en_si: So would you perhaps, if you turned away, cause corruption on earth and sever your [ties of] relationship?

content_ar: أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ اللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمْ وَأَعْمَىٰ أَبْصَارَهُمْ
content_en_si: Those [who do so] are the ones that Allah has cursed, so He deafened them and blinded their vision.

content_ar: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ الْقُرْآنَ أَمْ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقْفَالُهَا
content_en_si: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an, or are there locks upon [their] hearts?

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ ارْتَدُّوا عَلَىٰ أَدْبَارِهِم مِّن بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْهُدَى ۙ الشَّيْطَانُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمْ وَأَمْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who reverted back [to disbelief] after guidance had become clear to them - Satan enticed them and prolonged hope for them.

content_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُوا مَا نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمْ فِي بَعْضِ الْأَمْرِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِسْرَارَهُمْ
content_en_si: That is because they said to those who disliked what Allah sent down, "We will obey you in part of the matter." And Allah knows what they conceal.

content_ar: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتْهُمُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَارَهُمْ
content_en_si: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs?

content_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ اتَّبَعُوا مَا أَسْخَطَ اللَّهَ وَكَرِهُوا رِضْوَانَهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
content_en_si: That is because they followed what angered Allah and disliked [what earns] His pleasure, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

content_ar: أَمْ حَسِبَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخْرِجَ اللَّهُ أَضْغَانَهُمْ
content_en_si: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their [feelings of] hatred?

content_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَأَرَيْنَاكَهُمْ فَلَعَرَفْتَهُم بِسِيمَاهُمْ ۚ وَلَتَعْرِفَنَّهُمْ فِي لَحْنِ الْقَوْلِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ أَعْمَالَكُمْ
content_en_si: And if We willed, We could show them to you, and you would know them by their mark; but you will surely know them by the tone of [their] speech. And Allah knows your deeds.

content_ar: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَعْلَمَ الْمُجَاهِدِينَ مِنكُمْ وَالصَّابِرِينَ وَنَبْلُوَ أَخْبَارَكُمْ
content_en_si: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَشَاقُّوا الرَّسُولَ مِن بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّوا اللَّهَ شَيْئًا وَسَيُحْبِطُ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and opposed the Messenger after guidance had become clear to them - never will they harm Allah at all, and He will render worthless their deeds.

content_ar: ۞ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا الرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبْطِلُوا أَعْمَالَكُمْ
content_en_si: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and do not invalidate your deeds.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُوا وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌ فَلَن يَغْفِرَ اللَّهُ لَهُمْ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and then died while they were disbelievers - never will Allah forgive them.

content_ar: فَلَا تَهِنُوا وَتَدْعُوا إِلَى السَّلْمِ وَأَنتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ وَاللَّهُ مَعَكُمْ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمْ أَعْمَالَكُمْ
content_en_si: So do not weaken and call for peace while you are superior; and Allah is with you and will never deprive you of [the reward of] your deeds.

content_ar: إِنَّمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ ۚ وَإِن تُؤْمِنُوا وَتَتَّقُوا يُؤْتِكُمْ أُجُورَكُمْ وَلَا يَسْأَلْكُمْ أَمْوَالَكُمْ
content_en_si: [This] worldly life is only amusement and diversion. And if you believe and fear Allah, He will give you your rewards and not ask you for your properties.

content_ar: إِن يَسْأَلْكُمُوهَا فَيُحْفِكُمْ تَبْخَلُوا وَيُخْرِجْ أَضْغَانَكُمْ
content_en_si: If He should ask you for them and press you, you would withhold, and He would expose your unwillingness.

content_ar: هَا أَنتُمْ هَٰؤُلَاءِ تُدْعَوْنَ لِتُنفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبْخَلُ ۖ وَمَن يَبْخَلْ فَإِنَّمَا يَبْخَلُ عَن نَّفْسِهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ الْغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ ۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا يَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوا أَمْثَالَكُم
content_en_si: Here you are - those invited to spend in the cause of Allah - but among you are those who withhold [out of greed]. And whoever withholds only withholds [benefit] from himself; and Allah is the Free of need, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people; then they will not be the likes of you.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا فَتَحْنَا لَكَ فَتْحًا مُّبِينًا
content_en_si: Indeed, We have given you, [O Muhammad], a clear conquest

content_ar: لِّيَغْفِرَ لَكَ اللَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِن ذَنبِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُ عَلَيْكَ وَيَهْدِيَكَ صِرَاطًا مُّسْتَقِيمًا
content_en_si: That Allah may forgive for you what preceded of your sin and what will follow and complete His favor upon you and guide you to a straight path

content_ar: وَيَنصُرَكَ اللَّهُ نَصْرًا عَزِيزًا
content_en_si: And [that] Allah may aid you with a mighty victory.

content_ar: هُوَ الَّذِي أَنزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ فِي قُلُوبِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ لِيَزْدَادُوا إِيمَانًا مَّعَ إِيمَانِهِمْ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
content_en_si: It is He who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the believers that they would increase in faith along with their [present] faith. And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth, and ever is Allah Knowing and Wise.

content_ar: لِّيُدْخِلَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عِندَ اللَّهِ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًا
content_en_si: [And] that He may admit the believing men and the believing women to gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein eternally and remove from them their misdeeds - and ever is that, in the sight of Allah, a great attainment -

content_ar: وَيُعَذِّبَ الْمُنَافِقِينَ وَالْمُنَافِقَاتِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ وَالْمُشْرِكَاتِ الظَّانِّينَ بِاللَّهِ ظَنَّ السَّوْءِ ۚ عَلَيْهِمْ دَائِرَةُ السَّوْءِ ۖ وَغَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَعَنَهُمْ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَسَاءَتْ مَصِيرًا
content_en_si: And [that] He may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and polytheist women - those who assume about Allah an assumption of evil nature. Upon them is a misfortune of evil nature; and Allah has become angry with them and has cursed them and prepared for them Hell, and evil it is as a destination.

content_ar: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
content_en_si: And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

content_ar: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ شَاهِدًا وَمُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا
content_en_si: Indeed, We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner

content_ar: لِّتُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
content_en_si: That you [people] may believe in Allah and His Messenger and honor him and respect the Prophet and exalt Allah morning and afternoon.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِنَّمَا يُبَايِعُونَ اللَّهَ يَدُ اللَّهِ فَوْقَ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۚ فَمَن نَّكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنكُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ ۖ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِمَا عَاهَدَ عَلَيْهُ اللَّهَ فَسَيُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
content_en_si: Indeed, those who pledge allegiance to you, [O Muhammad] - they are actually pledging allegiance to Allah. The hand of Allah is over their hands. So he who breaks his word only breaks it to the detriment of himself. And he who fulfills that which he has promised Allah - He will give him a great reward.

content_ar: سَيَقُولُ لَكَ الْمُخَلَّفُونَ مِنَ الْأَعْرَابِ شَغَلَتْنَا أَمْوَالُنَا وَأَهْلُونَا فَاسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَلْسِنَتِهِم مَّا لَيْسَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ قُلْ فَمَن يَمْلِكُ لَكُم مِّنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا إِنْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ ضَرًّا أَوْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ نَفْعًا ۚ بَلْ كَانَ اللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا
content_en_si: Those who remained behind of the bedouins will say to you, "Our properties and our families occupied us, so ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not within their hearts. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He intended for you harm or intended for you benefit? Rather, ever is Allah, with what you do, Acquainted.

content_ar: بَلْ ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَنقَلِبَ الرَّسُولُ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِيهِمْ أَبَدًا وَزُيِّنَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَظَنَنتُمْ ظَنَّ السَّوْءِ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًا بُورًا
content_en_si: But you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, ever, and that was made pleasing in your hearts. And you assumed an assumption of evil and became a people ruined."

content_ar: وَمَن لَّمْ يُؤْمِن بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ فَإِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَعِيرًا
content_en_si: And whoever has not believed in Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers a Blaze.

content_ar: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ يَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
content_en_si: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

content_ar: سَيَقُولُ الْمُخَلَّفُونَ إِذَا انطَلَقْتُمْ إِلَىٰ مَغَانِمَ لِتَأْخُذُوهَا ذَرُونَا نَتَّبِعْكُمْ ۖ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُبَدِّلُوا كَلَامَ اللَّهِ ۚ قُل لَّن تَتَّبِعُونَا كَذَٰلِكُمْ قَالَ اللَّهُ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ فَسَيَقُولُونَ بَلْ تَحْسُدُونَنَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا لَا يَفْقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
content_en_si: Those who remained behind will say when you set out toward the war booty to take it, "Let us follow you." They wish to change the words of Allah. Say, "Never will you follow us. Thus did Allah say before." So they will say, "Rather, you envy us." But [in fact] they were not understanding except a little.

content_ar: قُل لِّلْمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ الْأَعْرَابِ سَتُدْعَوْنَ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ أُولِي بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ تُقَاتِلُونَهُمْ أَوْ يُسْلِمُونَ ۖ فَإِن تُطِيعُوا يُؤْتِكُمُ اللَّهُ أَجْرًا حَسَنًا ۖ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا كَمَا تَوَلَّيْتُم مِّن قَبْلُ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
content_en_si: Say to those who remained behind of the bedouins, "You will be called to [face] a people of great military might; you may fight them, or they will submit. So if you obey, Allah will give you a good reward; but if you turn away as you turned away before, He will punish you with a painful punishment."

content_ar: لَّيْسَ عَلَى الْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌ ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّبْهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
content_en_si: There is not upon the blind any guilt or upon the lame any guilt or upon the ill any guilt [for remaining behind]. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger - He will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow; but whoever turns away - He will punish him with a painful punishment.

content_ar: ۞ لَّقَدْ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذْ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحْتَ الشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ فَأَنزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَأَثَابَهُمْ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
content_en_si: Certainly was Allah pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you, [O Muhammad], under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquillity upon them and rewarded them with an imminent conquest

content_ar: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً يَأْخُذُونَهَا ۗ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
content_en_si: And much war booty which they will take. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

content_ar: وَعَدَكُمُ اللَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً تَأْخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمْ هَٰذِهِ وَكَفَّ أَيْدِيَ النَّاسِ عَنكُمْ وَلِتَكُونَ آيَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ صِرَاطًا مُّسْتَقِيمًا
content_en_si: Allah has promised you much booty that you will take [in the future] and has hastened for you this [victory] and withheld the hands of people from you - that it may be a sign for the believers and [that] He may guide you to a straight path.

content_ar: وَأُخْرَىٰ لَمْ تَقْدِرُوا عَلَيْهَا قَدْ أَحَاطَ اللَّهُ بِهَا ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرًا
content_en_si: And [He promises] other [victories] that you were [so far] unable to [realize] which Allah has already encompassed. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent.

content_ar: وَلَوْ قَاتَلَكُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَوَلَّوُا الْأَدْبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
content_en_si: And if those [Makkans] who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs [in flight]. Then they would not find a protector or a helper.

content_ar: سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ الَّتِي قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا
content_en_si: [This is] the established way of Allah which has occurred before. And never will you find in the way of Allah any change.

content_ar: وَهُوَ الَّذِي كَفَّ أَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ عَنْهُم بِبَطْنِ مَكَّةَ مِن بَعْدِ أَنْ أَظْفَرَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
content_en_si: And it is He who withheld their hands from you and your hands from them within [the area of] Makkah after He caused you to overcome them. And ever is Allah of what you do, Seeing.

content_ar: هُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوكُمْ عَنِ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَالْهَدْيَ مَعْكُوفًا أَن يَبْلُغَ مَحِلَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْلَا رِجَالٌ مُّؤْمِنُونَ وَنِسَاءٌ مُّؤْمِنَاتٌ لَّمْ تَعْلَمُوهُمْ أَن تَطَئُوهُمْ فَتُصِيبَكُم مِّنْهُم مَّعَرَّةٌ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۖ لِّيُدْخِلَ اللَّهُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ لَوْ تَزَيَّلُوا لَعَذَّبْنَا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
content_en_si: They are the ones who disbelieved and obstructed you from al-Masjid al-Haram while the offering was prevented from reaching its place of sacrifice. And if not for believing men and believing women whom you did not know - that you might trample them and there would befall you because of them dishonor without [your] knowledge - [you would have been permitted to enter Makkah]. [This was so] that Allah might admit to His mercy whom He willed. If they had been apart [from them], We would have punished those who disbelieved among them with painful punishment

content_ar: إِذْ جَعَلَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ اللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِ وَعَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ التَّقْوَىٰ وَكَانُوا أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمًا
content_en_si: When those who disbelieved had put into their hearts chauvinism - the chauvinism of the time of ignorance. But Allah sent down His tranquillity upon His Messenger and upon the believers and imposed upon them the word of righteousness, and they were more deserving of it and worthy of it. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing.

content_ar: لَّقَدْ صَدَقَ اللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ الرُّؤْيَا بِالْحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ الْمَسْجِدَ الْحَرَامَ إِن شَاءَ اللَّهُ آمِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا فَجَعَلَ مِن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
content_en_si: Certainly has Allah showed to His Messenger the vision in truth. You will surely enter al-Masjid al-Haram, if Allah wills, in safety, with your heads shaved and [hair] shortened, not fearing [anyone]. He knew what you did not know and has arranged before that a conquest near [at hand].

content_ar: هُوَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُ بِالْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ الْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُ عَلَى الدِّينِ كُلِّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِاللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
content_en_si: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion. And sufficient is Allah as Witness.

content_ar: مُّحَمَّدٌ رَّسُولُ اللَّهِ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ أَشِدَّاءُ عَلَى الْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَاءُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ تَرَاهُمْ رُكَّعًا سُجَّدًا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضْوَانًا ۖ سِيمَاهُمْ فِي وُجُوهِهِم مِّنْ أَثَرِ السُّجُودِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِي التَّوْرَاةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِي الْإِنجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْأَهُ فَآزَرَهُ فَاسْتَغْلَظَ فَاسْتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِ يُعْجِبُ الزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ الْكُفَّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ مِنْهُم مَّغْفِرَةً وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
content_en_si: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves. You see them bowing and prostrating [in prayer], seeking bounty from Allah and [His] pleasure. Their mark is on their faces from the trace of prostration. That is their description in the Torah. And their description in the Gospel is as a plant which produces its offshoots and strengthens them so they grow firm and stand upon their stalks, delighting the sowers - so that Allah may enrage by them the disbelievers. Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds among them forgiveness and a great reward.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تُقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيِ اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
content_en_si: O you who have believed, do not put [yourselves] before Allah and His Messenger but fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَرْفَعُوا أَصْوَاتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ النَّبِيِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا لَهُ بِالْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَن تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالُكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
content_en_si: O you who have believed, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be loud to him in speech like the loudness of some of you to others, lest your deeds become worthless while you perceive not.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَاتَهُمْ عِندَ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ امْتَحَنَ اللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who lower their voices before the Messenger of Allah - they are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for righteousness. For them is forgiveness and great reward.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَاءِ الْحُجُرَاتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who call you, [O Muhammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason.

content_ar: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
content_en_si: And if they had been patient until you [could] come out to them, it would have been better for them. But Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن جَاءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنُوا أَن تُصِيبُوا قَوْمًا بِجَهَالَةٍ فَتُصْبِحُوا عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَادِمِينَ
content_en_si: O you who have believed, if there comes to you a disobedient one with information, investigate, lest you harm a people out of ignorance and become, over what you have done, regretful.

content_ar: وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِي كَثِيرٍ مِّنَ الْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْإِيمَانَ وَزَيَّنَهُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْكُفْرَ وَالْفُسُوقَ وَالْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الرَّاشِدُونَ
content_en_si: And know that among you is the Messenger of Allah. If he were to obey you in much of the matter, you would be in difficulty, but Allah has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience. Those are the [rightly] guided.

content_ar: فَضْلًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
content_en_si: [It is] as bounty from Allah and favor. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.

content_ar: وَإِن طَائِفَتَانِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ اقْتَتَلُوا فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِن بَغَتْ إِحْدَاهُمَا عَلَى الْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَاتِلُوا الَّتِي تَبْغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيءَ إِلَىٰ أَمْرِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فَاءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا بِالْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوا ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُقْسِطِينَ
content_en_si: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight against the one that oppresses until it returns to the ordinance of Allah. And if it returns, then make settlement between them in justice and act justly. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.

content_ar: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
content_en_si: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear Allah that you may receive mercy.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِّن قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُونُوا خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَاءٌ مِّن نِّسَاءٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوا أَنفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا بِالْأَلْقَابِ ۖ بِئْسَ الِاسْمُ الْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ الْإِيمَانِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَتُبْ فَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ
content_en_si: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule [another] people; perhaps they may be better than them; nor let women ridicule [other] women; perhaps they may be better than them. And do not insult one another and do not call each other by [offensive] nicknames. Wretched is the name of disobedience after [one's] faith. And whoever does not repent - then it is those who are the wrongdoers.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اجْتَنِبُوا كَثِيرًا مِّنَ الظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ الظَّنِّ إِثْمٌ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا وَلَا يَغْتَب بَّعْضُكُم بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ رَّحِيمٌ
content_en_si: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَاكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَائِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوا ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ
content_en_si: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.

content_ar: ۞ قَالَتِ الْأَعْرَابُ آمَنَّا ۖ قُل لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا وَلَٰكِن قُولُوا أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ الْإِيمَانُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ لَا يَلِتْكُم مِّنْ أَعْمَالِكُمْ شَيْئًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
content_en_si: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."

content_ar: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا وَجَاهَدُوا بِأَمْوَالِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الصَّادِقُونَ
content_en_si: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah. It is those who are the truthful.

content_ar: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ اللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
content_en_si: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things?"

content_ar: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا عَلَيَّ إِسْلَامَكُم ۖ بَلِ اللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَاكُمْ لِلْإِيمَانِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
content_en_si: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful."

content_ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بَصِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
content_en_si: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ق ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ الْمَجِيدِ
content_en_si: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...

content_ar: بَلْ عَجِبُوا أَن جَاءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
content_en_si: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.

content_ar: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌ بَعِيدٌ
content_en_si: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."

content_ar: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَابٌ حَفِيظٌ
content_en_si: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.

content_ar: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِي أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
content_en_si: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.

content_ar: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَاهَا وَزَيَّنَّاهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
content_en_si: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?

content_ar: وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ بَهِيجٍ
content_en_si: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,

content_ar: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
content_en_si: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].

content_ar: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُّبَارَكًا فَأَنبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
content_en_si: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

content_ar: وَالنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَاتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
content_en_si: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -

content_ar: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ الْخُرُوجُ
content_en_si: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.

content_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
content_en_si: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

content_ar: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَانُ لُوطٍ
content_en_si: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

content_ar: وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
content_en_si: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

content_ar: أَفَعَيِينَا بِالْخَلْقِ الْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
content_en_si: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِ نَفْسُهُ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
content_en_si: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein

content_ar: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى الْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
content_en_si: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.

content_ar: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
content_en_si: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

content_ar: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
content_en_si: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.

content_ar: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْوَعِيدِ
content_en_si: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.

content_ar: وَجَاءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَائِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
content_en_si: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

content_ar: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِي غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ الْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
content_en_si: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."

content_ar: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
content_en_si: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."

content_ar: أَلْقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
content_en_si: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,

content_ar: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
content_en_si: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,

content_ar: الَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا آخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِي الْعَذَابِ الشَّدِيدِ
content_en_si: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."

content_ar: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُ رَبَّنَا مَا أَطْغَيْتُهُ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَالٍ بَعِيدٍ
content_en_si: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."

content_ar: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا لَدَيَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِالْوَعِيدِ
content_en_si: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.

content_ar: مَا يُبَدَّلُ الْقَوْلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَا أَنَا بِظَلَّامٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
content_en_si: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."

content_ar: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
content_en_si: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"

content_ar: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
content_en_si: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,

content_ar: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
content_en_si: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]

content_ar: مَّنْ خَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَجَاءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
content_en_si: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].

content_ar: ادْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَامٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُلُودِ
content_en_si: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

content_ar: لَهُم مَّا يَشَاءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
content_en_si: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.

content_ar: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا فِي الْبِلَادِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
content_en_si: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?

content_ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى السَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
content_en_si: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
content_en_si: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.

content_ar: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
content_en_si: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

content_ar: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَارَ السُّجُودِ
content_en_si: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.

content_ar: وَاسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ الْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
content_en_si: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -

content_ar: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ الصَّيْحَةَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُرُوجِ
content_en_si: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

content_ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا الْمَصِيرُ
content_en_si: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

content_ar: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ الْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
content_en_si: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.

content_ar: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
content_en_si: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالذَّارِيَاتِ ذَرْوًا
content_en_si: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing

content_ar: فَالْحَامِلَاتِ وِقْرًا
content_en_si: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

content_ar: فَالْجَارِيَاتِ يُسْرًا
content_en_si: And those [ships] sailing with ease

content_ar: فَالْمُقَسِّمَاتِ أَمْرًا
content_en_si: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,

content_ar: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

content_ar: وَإِنَّ الدِّينَ لَوَاقِعٌ
content_en_si: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.

content_ar: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْحُبُكِ
content_en_si: By the heaven containing pathways,

content_ar: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِي قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, you are in differing speech.

content_ar: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
content_en_si: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.

content_ar: قُتِلَ الْخَرَّاصُونَ
content_en_si: Destroyed are the falsifiers

content_ar: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
content_en_si: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.

content_ar: يَسْأَلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
content_en_si: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"

content_ar: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
content_en_si: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire

content_ar: ذُوقُوا فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
content_en_si: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."

content_ar: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,

content_ar: آخِذِينَ مَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
content_en_si: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.

content_ar: كَانُوا قَلِيلًا مِّنَ اللَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
content_en_si: They used to sleep but little of the night,

content_ar: وَبِالْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
content_en_si: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,

content_ar: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
content_en_si: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.

content_ar: وَفِي الْأَرْضِ آيَاتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
content_en_si: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

content_ar: وَفِي أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
content_en_si: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?

content_ar: وَفِي السَّمَاءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
content_en_si: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.

content_ar: فَوَرَبِّ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَا أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
content_en_si: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.

content_ar: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
content_en_si: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -

content_ar: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا سَلَامًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَامٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
content_en_si: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.

content_ar: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ فَجَاءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
content_en_si: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

content_ar: فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
content_en_si: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"

content_ar: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَامٍ عَلِيمٍ
content_en_si: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.

content_ar: فَأَقْبَلَتِ امْرَأَتُهُ فِي صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
content_en_si: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"

content_ar: قَالُوا كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْعَلِيمُ
content_en_si: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."

content_ar: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
content_en_si: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

content_ar: قَالُوا إِنَّا أُرْسِلْنَا إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
content_en_si: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

content_ar: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
content_en_si: To send down upon them stones of clay,

content_ar: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
content_en_si: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."

content_ar: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
content_en_si: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.

content_ar: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
content_en_si: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.

content_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَا آيَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
content_en_si: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

content_ar: وَفِي مُوسَىٰ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
content_en_si: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.

content_ar: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِ وَقَالَ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
content_en_si: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."

content_ar: فَأَخَذْنَاهُ وَجُنُودَهُ فَنَبَذْنَاهُمْ فِي الْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
content_en_si: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.

content_ar: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّيحَ الْعَقِيمَ
content_en_si: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

content_ar: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَالرَّمِيمِ
content_en_si: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.

content_ar: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
content_en_si: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

content_ar: فَعَتَوْا عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
content_en_si: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.

content_ar: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنتَصِرِينَ
content_en_si: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.

content_ar: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
content_en_si: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.

content_ar: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
content_en_si: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

content_ar: وَالْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمَاهِدُونَ
content_en_si: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.

content_ar: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
content_en_si: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.

content_ar: فَفِرُّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
content_en_si: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

content_ar: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا آخَرَ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
content_en_si: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

content_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ مَا أَتَى الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
content_en_si: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."

content_ar: أَتَوَاصَوْا بِهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
content_en_si: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.

content_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
content_en_si: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.

content_ar: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ الذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
content_en_si: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.

content_ar: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
content_en_si: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

content_ar: مَا أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَا أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
content_en_si: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.

content_ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
content_en_si: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

content_ar: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَابِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
content_en_si: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.

content_ar: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِن يَوْمِهِمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
content_en_si: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالطُّورِ
content_en_si: By the mount

content_ar: وَكِتَابٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
content_en_si: And [by] a Book inscribed

content_ar: فِي رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
content_en_si: In parchment spread open

content_ar: وَالْبَيْتِ الْمَعْمُورِ
content_en_si: And [by] the frequented House

content_ar: وَالسَّقْفِ الْمَرْفُوعِ
content_en_si: And [by] the heaven raised high

content_ar: وَالْبَحْرِ الْمَسْجُورِ
content_en_si: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],

content_ar: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَاقِعٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

content_ar: مَّا لَهُ مِن دَافِعٍ
content_en_si: Of it there is no preventer.

content_ar: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ السَّمَاءُ مَوْرًا
content_en_si: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

content_ar: وَتَسِيرُ الْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
content_en_si: And the mountains will pass on, departing -

content_ar: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
content_en_si: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

content_ar: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
content_en_si: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

content_ar: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
content_en_si: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

content_ar: هَٰذِهِ النَّارُ الَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
content_en_si: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.

content_ar: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَٰذَا أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
content_en_si: Then is this magic, or do you not see?

content_ar: اصْلَوْهَا فَاصْبِرُوا أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
content_en_si: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."

content_ar: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

content_ar: فَاكِهِينَ بِمَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
content_en_si: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

content_ar: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
content_en_si: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

content_ar: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
content_en_si: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

content_ar: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَاتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَانٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَا أَلَتْنَاهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
content_en_si: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.

content_ar: وَأَمْدَدْنَاهُم بِفَاكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
content_en_si: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

content_ar: يَتَنَازَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
content_en_si: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

content_ar: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
content_en_si: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

content_ar: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
content_en_si: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

content_ar: قَالُوا إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِي أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
content_en_si: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].

content_ar: فَمَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَانَا عَذَابَ السَّمُومِ
content_en_si: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

content_ar: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْبَرُّ الرَّحِيمُ
content_en_si: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

content_ar: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
content_en_si: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

content_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِ رَيْبَ الْمَنُونِ
content_en_si: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"

content_ar: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ الْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
content_en_si: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."

content_ar: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَامُهُم بِهَٰذَا ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
content_en_si: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?

content_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
content_en_si: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

content_ar: فَلْيَأْتُوا بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِ إِن كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
content_en_si: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

content_ar: أَمْ خُلِقُوا مِنْ غَيْرِ شَيْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ الْخَالِقُونَ
content_en_si: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

content_ar: أَمْ خَلَقُوا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
content_en_si: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

content_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ الْمُصَيْطِرُونَ
content_en_si: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

content_ar: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
content_en_si: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.

content_ar: أَمْ لَهُ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَكُمُ الْبَنُونَ
content_en_si: Or has He daughters while you have sons?

content_ar: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
content_en_si: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

content_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
content_en_si: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

content_ar: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا هُمُ الْمَكِيدُونَ
content_en_si: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.

content_ar: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَٰهٌ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
content_en_si: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

content_ar: وَإِن يَرَوْا كِسْفًا مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
content_en_si: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."

content_ar: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
content_en_si: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

content_ar: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
content_en_si: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

content_ar: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
content_en_si: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

content_ar: وَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
content_en_si: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.

content_ar: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَارَ النُّجُومِ
content_en_si: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
content_en_si: By the star when it descends,

content_ar: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
content_en_si: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,

content_ar: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
content_en_si: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.

content_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْيٌ يُوحَىٰ
content_en_si: It is not but a revelation revealed,

content_ar: عَلَّمَهُ شَدِيدُ الْقُوَىٰ
content_en_si: Taught to him by one intense in strength -

content_ar: ذُو مِرَّةٍ فَاسْتَوَىٰ
content_en_si: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form

content_ar: وَهُوَ بِالْأُفُقِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
content_en_si: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.

content_ar: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
content_en_si: Then he approached and descended

content_ar: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ
content_en_si: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.

content_ar: فَأَوْحَىٰ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ مَا أَوْحَىٰ
content_en_si: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.

content_ar: مَا كَذَبَ الْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰ
content_en_si: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.

content_ar: أَفَتُمَارُونَهُ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ
content_en_si: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ
content_en_si: And he certainly saw him in another descent

content_ar: عِندَ سِدْرَةِ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
content_en_si: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -

content_ar: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ الْمَأْوَىٰ
content_en_si: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -

content_ar: إِذْ يَغْشَى السِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ
content_en_si: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].

content_ar: مَا زَاغَ الْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
content_en_si: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].

content_ar: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَىٰ
content_en_si: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.

content_ar: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ اللَّاتَ وَالْعُزَّىٰ
content_en_si: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?

content_ar: وَمَنَاةَ الثَّالِثَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
content_en_si: And Manat, the third - the other one?

content_ar: أَلَكُمُ الذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ الْأُنثَىٰ
content_en_si: Is the male for you and for Him the female?

content_ar: تِلْكَ إِذًا قِسْمَةٌ ضِيزَىٰ
content_en_si: That, then, is an unjust division.

content_ar: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا أَسْمَاءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَا أَنتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُم مَّا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَانٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى الْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ الْهُدَىٰ
content_en_si: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.

content_ar: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَانِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
content_en_si: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?

content_ar: فَلِلَّهِ الْآخِرَةُ وَالْأُولَىٰ
content_en_si: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

content_ar: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ لَا تُغْنِي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيَرْضَىٰ
content_en_si: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ الْمَلَائِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ الْأُنثَىٰ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,

content_ar: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ الظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِي مِنَ الْحَقِّ شَيْئًا
content_en_si: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.

content_ar: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
content_en_si: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.

content_ar: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اهْتَدَىٰ
content_en_si: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.

content_ar: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسَاءُوا بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا بِالْحُسْنَى
content_en_si: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -

content_ar: الَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَائِرَ الْإِثْمِ وَالْفَوَاحِشَ إِلَّا اللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَاسِعُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوا أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ
content_en_si: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.

content_ar: أَفَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ
content_en_si: Have you seen the one who turned away

content_ar: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَىٰ
content_en_si: And gave a little and [then] refrained?

content_ar: أَعِندَهُ عِلْمُ الْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰ
content_en_si: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?

content_ar: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
content_en_si: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

content_ar: وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ الَّذِي وَفَّىٰ
content_en_si: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -

content_ar: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ
content_en_si: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

content_ar: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
content_en_si: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

content_ar: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ
content_en_si: And that his effort is going to be seen -

content_ar: ثُمَّ يُجْزَاهُ الْجَزَاءَ الْأَوْفَىٰ
content_en_si: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

content_ar: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
content_en_si: And that to your Lord is the finality

content_ar: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ
content_en_si: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

content_ar: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
content_en_si: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

content_ar: وَأَنَّهُ خَلَقَ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
content_en_si: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -

content_ar: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ
content_en_si: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

content_ar: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
content_en_si: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

content_ar: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ
content_en_si: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

content_ar: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّ الشِّعْرَىٰ
content_en_si: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

content_ar: وَأَنَّهُ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا الْأُولَىٰ
content_en_si: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

content_ar: وَثَمُودَ فَمَا أَبْقَىٰ
content_en_si: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -

content_ar: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
content_en_si: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

content_ar: وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ
content_en_si: And the overturned towns He hurled down

content_ar: فَغَشَّاهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
content_en_si: And covered them by that which He covered.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
content_en_si: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

content_ar: هَٰذَا نَذِيرٌ مِّنَ النُّذُرِ الْأُولَىٰ
content_en_si: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.

content_ar: أَزِفَتِ الْآزِفَةُ
content_en_si: The Approaching Day has approached.

content_ar: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
content_en_si: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.

content_ar: أَفَمِنْ هَٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
content_en_si: Then at this statement do you wonder?

content_ar: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
content_en_si: And you laugh and do not weep

content_ar: وَأَنتُمْ سَامِدُونَ
content_en_si: While you are proudly sporting?

content_ar: فَاسْجُدُوا لِلَّهِ وَاعْبُدُوا ۩
content_en_si: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
content_en_si: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].

content_ar: وَإِن يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
content_en_si: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."

content_ar: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
content_en_si: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّنَ الْأَنبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
content_en_si: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -

content_ar: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
content_en_si: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].

content_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
content_en_si: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,

content_ar: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
content_en_si: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,

content_ar: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
content_en_si: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."

content_ar: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
content_en_si: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.

content_ar: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانتَصِرْ
content_en_si: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."

content_ar: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
content_en_si: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

content_ar: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
content_en_si: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.

content_ar: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
content_en_si: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,

content_ar: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
content_en_si: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.

content_ar: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
content_en_si: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?

content_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
content_en_si: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
content_en_si: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

content_ar: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
content_en_si: Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

content_ar: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
content_en_si: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,

content_ar: تَنزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
content_en_si: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.

content_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
content_en_si: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
content_en_si: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

content_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
content_en_si: Thamud denied the warning

content_ar: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَاحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
content_en_si: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.

content_ar: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِن بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
content_en_si: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."

content_ar: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
content_en_si: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.

content_ar: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
content_en_si: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.

content_ar: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
content_en_si: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].

content_ar: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
content_en_si: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].

content_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
content_en_si: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

content_ar: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
content_en_si: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
content_en_si: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

content_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
content_en_si: The people of Lot denied the warning.

content_ar: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَاهُم بِسَحَرٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

content_ar: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي مَن شَكَرَ
content_en_si: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
content_en_si: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِ فَطَمَسْنَا أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
content_en_si: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
content_en_si: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.

content_ar: فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
content_en_si: So taste My punishment and warning.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
content_en_si: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَ آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُ
content_en_si: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.

content_ar: كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَاهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
content_en_si: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.

content_ar: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُولَٰئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَاءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
content_en_si: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?

content_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
content_en_si: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?

content_ar: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ الدُّبُرَ
content_en_si: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].

content_ar: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
content_en_si: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.

content_ar: إِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.

content_ar: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِي النَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
content_en_si: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."

content_ar: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَاهُ بِقَدَرٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.

content_ar: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
content_en_si: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
content_en_si: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?

content_ar: وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِي الزُّبُرِ
content_en_si: And everything they did is in written records.

content_ar: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
content_en_si: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.

content_ar: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,

content_ar: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
content_en_si: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الرَّحْمَٰنُ
content_en_si: The Most Merciful

content_ar: عَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ
content_en_si: Taught the Qur'an,

content_ar: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ
content_en_si: Created man,

content_ar: عَلَّمَهُ الْبَيَانَ
content_en_si: [And] taught him eloquence.

content_ar: الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍ
content_en_si: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,

content_ar: وَالنَّجْمُ وَالشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ
content_en_si: And the stars and trees prostrate.

content_ar: وَالسَّمَاءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ الْمِيزَانَ
content_en_si: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance

content_ar: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا فِي الْمِيزَانِ
content_en_si: That you not transgress within the balance.

content_ar: وَأَقِيمُوا الْوَزْنَ بِالْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا الْمِيزَانَ
content_en_si: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.

content_ar: وَالْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
content_en_si: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.

content_ar: فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَالنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ الْأَكْمَامِ
content_en_si: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]

content_ar: وَالْحَبُّ ذُو الْعَصْفِ وَالرَّيْحَانُ
content_en_si: And grain having husks and scented plants.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِن صَلْصَالٍ كَالْفَخَّارِ
content_en_si: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.

content_ar: وَخَلَقَ الْجَانَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
content_en_si: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ الْمَغْرِبَيْنِ
content_en_si: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: مَرَجَ الْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ
content_en_si: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];

content_ar: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ
content_en_si: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا اللُّؤْلُؤُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
content_en_si: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: وَلَهُ الْجَوَارِ الْمُنشَآتُ فِي الْبَحْرِ كَالْأَعْلَامِ
content_en_si: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍ
content_en_si: Everyone upon the earth will perish,

content_ar: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
content_en_si: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: يَسْأَلُهُ مَن فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأْنٍ
content_en_si: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ الثَّقَلَانِ
content_en_si: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: يَا مَعْشَرَ الْجِنِّ وَالْإِنسِ إِنِ اسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا مِنْ أَقْطَارِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ فَانفُذُوا ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَانٍ
content_en_si: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
content_en_si: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: فَإِذَا انشَقَّتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَالدِّهَانِ
content_en_si: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

content_ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْأَلُ عَن ذَنبِهِ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَانٌّ
content_en_si: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: يُعْرَفُ الْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَاهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِالنَّوَاصِي وَالْأَقْدَامِ
content_en_si: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: هَٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
content_en_si: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.

content_ar: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ آنٍ
content_en_si: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ جَنَّتَانِ
content_en_si: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

content_ar: ذَوَاتَا أَفْنَانٍ
content_en_si: Having [spreading] branches.

content_ar: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
content_en_si: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

content_ar: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ
