content_en_si: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -

content_ar: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
content_en_si: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,

content_ar: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
content_en_si: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -

content_ar: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
content_en_si: So as for he who transgressed

content_ar: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
content_en_si: And preferred the life of the world,

content_ar: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
content_en_si: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.

content_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
content_en_si: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,

content_ar: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
content_en_si: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.

content_ar: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
content_en_si: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?

content_ar: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
content_en_si: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?

content_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
content_en_si: To your Lord is its finality.

content_ar: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
content_en_si: You are only a warner for those who fear it.

content_ar: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
content_en_si: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
content_en_si: The Prophet frowned and turned away

content_ar: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
content_en_si: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].

content_ar: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
content_en_si: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified

content_ar: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
content_en_si: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?

content_ar: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
content_en_si: As for he who thinks himself without need,

content_ar: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
content_en_si: To him you give attention.

content_ar: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
content_en_si: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.

content_ar: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
content_en_si: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]

content_ar: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
content_en_si: While he fears [Allah],

content_ar: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
content_en_si: From him you are distracted.

content_ar: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
content_en_si: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;

content_ar: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
content_en_si: So whoever wills may remember it.

content_ar: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
content_en_si: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,

content_ar: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
content_en_si: Exalted and purified,

content_ar: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
content_en_si: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,

content_ar: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
content_en_si: Noble and dutiful.

content_ar: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
content_en_si: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.

content_ar: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
content_en_si: From what substance did He create him?

content_ar: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
content_en_si: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;

content_ar: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
content_en_si: Then He eased the way for him;

content_ar: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
content_en_si: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.

content_ar: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
content_en_si: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.

content_ar: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
content_en_si: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.

content_ar: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
content_en_si: Then let mankind look at his food -

content_ar: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
content_en_si: How We poured down water in torrents,

content_ar: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
content_en_si: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],

content_ar: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
content_en_si: And caused to grow within it grain

content_ar: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
content_en_si: And grapes and herbage

content_ar: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
content_en_si: And olive and palm trees

content_ar: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
content_en_si: And gardens of dense shrubbery

content_ar: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
content_en_si: And fruit and grass -

content_ar: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
content_en_si: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.

content_ar: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
content_en_si: But when there comes the Deafening Blast

content_ar: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
content_en_si: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

content_ar: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
content_en_si: And his mother and his father

content_ar: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
content_en_si: And his wife and his children,

content_ar: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
content_en_si: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.

content_ar: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
content_en_si: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -

content_ar: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
content_en_si: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.

content_ar: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
content_en_si: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.

content_ar: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
content_en_si: Blackness will cover them.

content_ar: أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
content_en_si: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
content_en_si: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

content_ar: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
content_en_si: And when the stars fall, dispersing,

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
content_en_si: And when the mountains are removed

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
content_en_si: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
content_en_si: And when the wild beasts are gathered

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
content_en_si: And when the seas are filled with flame

content_ar: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
content_en_si: And when the souls are paired

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
content_en_si: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

content_ar: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
content_en_si: For what sin she was killed

content_ar: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
content_en_si: And when the pages are made public

content_ar: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
content_en_si: And when the sky is stripped away

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
content_en_si: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
content_en_si: And when Paradise is brought near,

content_ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
content_en_si: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

content_ar: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
content_en_si: So I swear by the retreating stars -

content_ar: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
content_en_si: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -

content_ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
content_en_si: And by the night as it closes in

content_ar: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
content_en_si: And by the dawn when it breathes

content_ar: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
content_en_si: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger

content_ar: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
content_en_si: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],

content_ar: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
content_en_si: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.

content_ar: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
content_en_si: And your companion is not [at all] mad.

content_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
content_en_si: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.

content_ar: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
content_en_si: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.

content_ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
content_en_si: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].

content_ar: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
content_en_si: So where are you going?

content_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
content_en_si: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

content_ar: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
content_en_si: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.

content_ar: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
content_en_si: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
content_en_si: When the sky breaks apart

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
content_en_si: And when the stars fall, scattering,

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
content_en_si: And when the seas are erupted

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
content_en_si: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,

content_ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
content_en_si: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
content_en_si: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,

content_ar: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
content_en_si: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?

content_ar: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
content_en_si: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.

content_ar: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
content_en_si: No! But you deny the Recompense.

content_ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
content_en_si: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,

content_ar: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
content_en_si: Noble and recording;

content_ar: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
content_en_si: They know whatever you do.

content_ar: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,

content_ar: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
content_en_si: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.

content_ar: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
content_en_si: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,

content_ar: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
content_en_si: And never therefrom will they be absent.

content_ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
content_en_si: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

content_ar: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
content_en_si: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

content_ar: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
content_en_si: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
content_en_si: Woe to those who give less [than due],

content_ar: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
content_en_si: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

content_ar: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
content_en_si: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.

content_ar: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
content_en_si: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

content_ar: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
content_en_si: For a tremendous Day -

content_ar: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
content_en_si: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

content_ar: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
content_en_si: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.

content_ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
content_en_si: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?

content_ar: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
content_en_si: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.

content_ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
content_en_si: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,

content_ar: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
content_en_si: Who deny the Day of Recompense.

content_ar: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
content_en_si: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

content_ar: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
content_en_si: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

content_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
content_en_si: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

content_ar: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
content_en_si: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.

content_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
content_en_si: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

content_ar: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
content_en_si: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

content_ar: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
content_en_si: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.

content_ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
content_en_si: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?

content_ar: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
content_en_si: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

content_ar: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
content_en_si: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].

content_ar: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

content_ar: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
content_en_si: On adorned couches, observing.

content_ar: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
content_en_si: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.

content_ar: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
content_en_si: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

content_ar: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
content_en_si: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.

content_ar: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
content_en_si: And its mixture is of Tasneem,

content_ar: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
content_en_si: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

content_ar: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
content_en_si: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

content_ar: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
content_en_si: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

content_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
content_en_si: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."

content_ar: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
content_en_si: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

content_ar: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
content_en_si: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,

content_ar: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
content_en_si: On adorned couches, observing.

content_ar: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
content_en_si: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
content_en_si: When the sky has split [open]

content_ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
content_en_si: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

content_ar: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
content_en_si: And when the earth has been extended

content_ar: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
content_en_si: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

content_ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
content_en_si: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -

content_ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
content_en_si: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

content_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
content_en_si: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

content_ar: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
content_en_si: He will be judged with an easy account

content_ar: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
content_en_si: And return to his people in happiness.

content_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
content_en_si: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

content_ar: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
content_en_si: He will cry out for destruction

content_ar: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
content_en_si: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.

content_ar: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
content_en_si: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

content_ar: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
content_en_si: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].

content_ar: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
content_en_si: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.

content_ar: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
content_en_si: So I swear by the twilight glow

content_ar: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
content_en_si: And [by] the night and what it envelops

content_ar: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
content_en_si: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

content_ar: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
content_en_si: [That] you will surely experience state after state.

content_ar: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
content_en_si: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

content_ar: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
content_en_si: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?

content_ar: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
content_en_si: But those who have disbelieved deny,

content_ar: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
content_en_si: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

content_ar: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
content_en_si: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

content_ar: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
content_en_si: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
content_en_si: By the sky containing great stars

content_ar: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
content_en_si: And [by] the promised Day

content_ar: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
content_en_si: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,

content_ar: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
content_en_si: Cursed were the companions of the trench

content_ar: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
content_en_si: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,

content_ar: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
content_en_si: When they were sitting near it

content_ar: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
content_en_si: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.

content_ar: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
content_en_si: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,

content_ar: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
content_en_si: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
content_en_si: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

content_ar: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.

content_ar: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
content_en_si: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.

content_ar: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
content_en_si: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

content_ar: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
content_en_si: Honorable Owner of the Throne,

content_ar: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
content_en_si: Effecter of what He intends.

content_ar: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
content_en_si: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -

content_ar: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
content_en_si: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?

content_ar: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
content_en_si: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,

content_ar: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
content_en_si: While Allah encompasses them from behind.

content_ar: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
content_en_si: But this is an honored Qur'an

content_ar: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
content_en_si: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
content_en_si: By the sky and the night comer -

content_ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
content_en_si: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

content_ar: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
content_en_si: It is the piercing star -

content_ar: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
content_en_si: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.

content_ar: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
content_en_si: So let man observe from what he was created.

content_ar: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
content_en_si: He was created from a fluid, ejected,

content_ar: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
content_en_si: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

content_ar: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.

content_ar: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
content_en_si: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

content_ar: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
content_en_si: Then man will have no power or any helper.

content_ar: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
content_en_si: By the sky which returns [rain]

content_ar: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
content_en_si: And [by] the earth which cracks open,

content_ar: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,

content_ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
content_en_si: And it is not amusement.

content_ar: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
content_en_si: Indeed, they are planning a plan,

content_ar: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
content_en_si: But I am planning a plan.

content_ar: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
content_en_si: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
content_en_si: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

content_ar: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
content_en_si: Who created and proportioned

content_ar: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
content_en_si: And who destined and [then] guided

content_ar: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
content_en_si: And who brings out the pasture

content_ar: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
content_en_si: And [then] makes it black stubble.

content_ar: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
content_en_si: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,

content_ar: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
content_en_si: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.

content_ar: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
content_en_si: And We will ease you toward ease.

content_ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
content_en_si: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;

content_ar: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
content_en_si: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.

content_ar: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
content_en_si: But the wretched one will avoid it -

content_ar: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
content_en_si: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,

content_ar: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
content_en_si: Neither dying therein nor living.

content_ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
content_en_si: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

content_ar: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
content_en_si: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.

content_ar: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
content_en_si: But you prefer the worldly life,

content_ar: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
content_en_si: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.

content_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
content_en_si: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,

content_ar: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
content_en_si: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
content_en_si: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?

content_ar: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
content_en_si: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,

content_ar: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
content_en_si: Working [hard] and exhausted.

content_ar: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
content_en_si: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.

content_ar: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
content_en_si: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.

content_ar: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
content_en_si: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

content_ar: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
content_en_si: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.

content_ar: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
content_en_si: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.

content_ar: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
content_en_si: With their effort [they are] satisfied

content_ar: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
content_en_si: In an elevated garden,

content_ar: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
content_en_si: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.

content_ar: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
content_en_si: Within it is a flowing spring.

content_ar: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
content_en_si: Within it are couches raised high

content_ar: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
content_en_si: And cups put in place

content_ar: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
content_en_si: And cushions lined up

content_ar: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
content_en_si: And carpets spread around.

content_ar: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
content_en_si: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?

content_ar: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
content_en_si: And at the sky - how it is raised?

content_ar: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
content_en_si: And at the mountains - how they are erected?

content_ar: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
content_en_si: And at the earth - how it is spread out?

content_ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
content_en_si: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.

content_ar: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
content_en_si: You are not over them a controller.

content_ar: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
content_en_si: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -

content_ar: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
content_en_si: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.

content_ar: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
content_en_si: Indeed, to Us is their return.

content_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
content_en_si: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْفَجْرِ
content_en_si: By the dawn

content_ar: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
content_en_si: And [by] ten nights

content_ar: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
content_en_si: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

content_ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
content_en_si: And [by] the night when it passes,

content_ar: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِي حِجْرٍ
content_en_si: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

content_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
content_en_si: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -

content_ar: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
content_en_si: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,

content_ar: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
content_en_si: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?

content_ar: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
content_en_si: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?

content_ar: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
content_en_si: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -

content_ar: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
content_en_si: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands

content_ar: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
content_en_si: And increased therein the corruption.

content_ar: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
content_en_si: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

content_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
content_en_si: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

content_ar: فَأَمَّا الْإِنسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
content_en_si: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

content_ar: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
content_en_si: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."

content_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
content_en_si: No! But you do not honor the orphan

content_ar: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
content_en_si: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.

content_ar: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
content_en_si: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,

content_ar: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
content_en_si: And you love wealth with immense love.

content_ar: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
content_en_si: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -

content_ar: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
content_en_si: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,

content_ar: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
content_en_si: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?

content_ar: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
content_en_si: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."

content_ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
content_en_si: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,

content_ar: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
content_en_si: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].

content_ar: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
content_en_si: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,

content_ar: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
content_en_si: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],

content_ar: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
content_en_si: And enter among My [righteous] servants

content_ar: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
content_en_si: And enter My Paradise."

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
content_en_si: I swear by this city, Makkah -

content_ar: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
content_en_si: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -

content_ar: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
content_en_si: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],

content_ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
content_en_si: We have certainly created man into hardship.

content_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
content_en_si: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?

content_ar: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
content_en_si: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."

content_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
content_en_si: Does he think that no one has seen him?

content_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
content_en_si: Have We not made for him two eyes?

content_ar: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
content_en_si: And a tongue and two lips?

content_ar: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
content_en_si: And have shown him the two ways?

content_ar: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
content_en_si: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.

content_ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
content_en_si: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?

content_ar: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
content_en_si: It is the freeing of a slave

content_ar: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
content_en_si: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

content_ar: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
content_en_si: An orphan of near relationship

content_ar: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
content_en_si: Or a needy person in misery

content_ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
content_en_si: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

content_ar: أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
content_en_si: Those are the companions of the right.

content_ar: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
content_en_si: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.

content_ar: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
content_en_si: Over them will be fire closed in.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
content_en_si: By the sun and its brightness

content_ar: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
content_en_si: And [by] the moon when it follows it

content_ar: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
content_en_si: And [by] the day when it displays it

content_ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
content_en_si: And [by] the night when it covers it

content_ar: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
content_en_si: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

content_ar: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
content_en_si: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

content_ar: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
content_en_si: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

content_ar: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
content_en_si: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

content_ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
content_en_si: He has succeeded who purifies it,

content_ar: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّاهَا
content_en_si: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

content_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
content_en_si: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

content_ar: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
content_en_si: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

content_ar: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
content_en_si: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

content_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
content_en_si: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

content_ar: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
content_en_si: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
content_en_si: By the night when it covers

content_ar: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
content_en_si: And [by] the day when it appears

content_ar: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
content_en_si: And [by] He who created the male and female,

content_ar: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
content_en_si: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.

content_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
content_en_si: As for he who gives and fears Allah

content_ar: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
content_en_si: And believes in the best [reward],

content_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
content_en_si: We will ease him toward ease.

content_ar: وَأَمَّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
content_en_si: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

content_ar: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
content_en_si: And denies the best [reward],

content_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
content_en_si: We will ease him toward difficulty.

content_ar: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
content_en_si: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?

content_ar: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
content_en_si: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.

content_ar: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
content_en_si: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

content_ar: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
content_en_si: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.

content_ar: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
content_en_si: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.

content_ar: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
content_en_si: Who had denied and turned away.

content_ar: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
content_en_si: But the righteous one will avoid it -

content_ar: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
content_en_si: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself

content_ar: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
content_en_si: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

content_ar: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
content_en_si: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.

content_ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
content_en_si: And he is going to be satisfied.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالضُّحَىٰ
content_en_si: By the morning brightness

content_ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
content_en_si: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,

content_ar: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
content_en_si: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].

content_ar: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
content_en_si: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

content_ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
content_en_si: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

content_ar: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
content_en_si: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

content_ar: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
content_en_si: And He found you lost and guided [you],

content_ar: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
content_en_si: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

content_ar: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
content_en_si: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

content_ar: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
content_en_si: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].

content_ar: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
content_en_si: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
content_en_si: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?

content_ar: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
content_en_si: And We removed from you your burden

content_ar: الَّذِي أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
content_en_si: Which had weighed upon your back

content_ar: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
content_en_si: And raised high for you your repute.

content_ar: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
content_en_si: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

content_ar: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
content_en_si: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

content_ar: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
content_en_si: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].

content_ar: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَب
content_en_si: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.

content_ar: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
content_en_si: By the fig and the olive

content_ar: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
content_en_si: And [by] Mount Sinai

content_ar: وَهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
content_en_si: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],

content_ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
content_en_si: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;

content_ar: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
content_en_si: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

content_ar: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
content_en_si: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.

content_ar: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
content_en_si: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?

content_ar: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
content_en_si: Is not Allah the most just of judges?

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
content_en_si: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -

content_ar: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
content_en_si: Created man from a clinging substance.

content_ar: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
content_en_si: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -

content_ar: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
content_en_si: Who taught by the pen -

content_ar: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
content_en_si: Taught man that which he knew not.

content_ar: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
content_en_si: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses

content_ar: أَن رَّآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
content_en_si: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.

content_ar: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
content_en_si: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.

content_ar: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
content_en_si: Have you seen the one who forbids

content_ar: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
content_en_si: A servant when he prays?

content_ar: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
content_en_si: Have you seen if he is upon guidance

content_ar: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
content_en_si: Or enjoins righteousness?

content_ar: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
content_en_si: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -

content_ar: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
content_en_si: Does he not know that Allah sees?

content_ar: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
content_en_si: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -

content_ar: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
content_en_si: A lying, sinning forelock.

content_ar: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
content_en_si: Then let him call his associates;

content_ar: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
content_en_si: We will call the angels of Hell.

content_ar: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِب ۩
content_en_si: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].

content_ar: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
content_en_si: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.

content_ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
content_en_si: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

content_ar: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
content_en_si: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

content_ar: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
content_en_si: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.

content_ar: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
content_en_si: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
content_en_si: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -

content_ar: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
content_en_si: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures

content_ar: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
content_en_si: Within which are correct writings.

content_ar: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
content_en_si: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.

content_ar: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
content_en_si: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
content_en_si: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.

content_ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
content_en_si: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.

content_ar: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
content_en_si: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
content_en_si: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

content_ar: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
content_en_si: And the earth discharges its burdens

content_ar: وَقَالَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا لَهَا
content_en_si: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -

content_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
content_en_si: That Day, it will report its news

content_ar: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
content_en_si: Because your Lord has commanded it.

content_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
content_en_si: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

content_ar: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
content_en_si: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

content_ar: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
content_en_si: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
content_en_si: By the racers, panting,

content_ar: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
content_en_si: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

content_ar: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
content_en_si: And the chargers at dawn,

content_ar: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
content_en_si: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,

content_ar: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
content_en_si: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,

content_ar: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
content_en_si: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.

content_ar: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
content_en_si: And indeed, he is to that a witness.

content_ar: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
content_en_si: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

content_ar: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
content_en_si: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered

content_ar: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
content_en_si: And that within the breasts is obtained,

content_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْقَارِعَةُ
content_en_si: The Striking Calamity -

content_ar: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
content_en_si: What is the Striking Calamity?

content_ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
content_en_si: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?

content_ar: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
content_en_si: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

content_ar: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنفُوشِ
content_en_si: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.

content_ar: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
content_en_si: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],

content_ar: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
content_en_si: He will be in a pleasant life.

content_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
content_en_si: But as for one whose scales are light,

content_ar: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
content_en_si: His refuge will be an abyss.

content_ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
content_en_si: And what can make you know what that is?

content_ar: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
content_en_si: It is a Fire, intensely hot.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
content_en_si: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you

content_ar: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
content_en_si: Until you visit the graveyards.

content_ar: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
content_en_si: No! You are going to know.

content_ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
content_en_si: Then no! You are going to know.

content_ar: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
content_en_si: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...

content_ar: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
content_en_si: You will surely see the Hellfire.

content_ar: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
content_en_si: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

content_ar: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
content_en_si: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَصْرِ
content_en_si: By time,

content_ar: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
content_en_si: Indeed, mankind is in loss,

content_ar: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
content_en_si: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
content_en_si: Woe to every scorner and mocker

content_ar: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
content_en_si: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

content_ar: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
content_en_si: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

content_ar: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
content_en_si: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.

content_ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
content_en_si: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?

content_ar: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
content_en_si: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,

content_ar: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
content_en_si: Which mounts directed at the hearts.

content_ar: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
content_en_si: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them

content_ar: فِي عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ
content_en_si: In extended columns.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
content_en_si: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?

content_ar: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
content_en_si: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

content_ar: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
content_en_si: And He sent against them birds in flocks,

content_ar: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
content_en_si: Striking them with stones of hard clay,

content_ar: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍ
content_en_si: And He made them like eaten straw.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
content_en_si: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

content_ar: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
content_en_si: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

content_ar: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
content_en_si: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

content_ar: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
content_en_si: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
content_en_si: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

content_ar: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
content_en_si: For that is the one who drives away the orphan

content_ar: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
content_en_si: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

content_ar: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
content_en_si: So woe to those who pray

content_ar: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
content_en_si: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -

content_ar: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
content_en_si: Those who make show [of their deeds]

content_ar: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
content_en_si: And withhold [simple] assistance.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
content_en_si: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

content_ar: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
content_en_si: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].

content_ar: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
content_en_si: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
content_en_si: Say, "O disbelievers,

content_ar: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
content_en_si: I do not worship what you worship.

content_ar: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
content_en_si: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

content_ar: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
content_en_si: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.

content_ar: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
content_en_si: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.

content_ar: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
content_en_si: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
content_en_si: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

content_ar: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
content_en_si: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

content_ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
content_en_si: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
content_en_si: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

content_ar: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
content_en_si: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

content_ar: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
content_en_si: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame

content_ar: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
content_en_si: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.

content_ar: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍ
content_en_si: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
content_en_si: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,

content_ar: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
content_en_si: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

content_ar: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
content_en_si: He neither begets nor is born,

content_ar: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
content_en_si: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
content_en_si: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak

content_ar: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
content_en_si: From the evil of that which He created

content_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
content_en_si: And from the evil of darkness when it settles

content_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
content_en_si: And from the evil of the blowers in knots

content_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
content_en_si: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."

content_ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
content_en_si: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

content_ar: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
content_en_si: The Sovereign of mankind.

content_ar: إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ
content_en_si: The God of mankind,

content_ar: مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
content_en_si: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -

content_ar: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
content_en_si: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -

content_ar: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
content_en_si: From among the jinn and mankind."
